\begin{entry}
\word{yaMtarxvAhaka}\label{yaMtarxvAhaka}
\src{va}
\meaning{\arthanonum{jagatetxMba yaMtarxvanunx ADisuva \hbox{parashiva}. yaMtarxvAhaka `jagatutx' eMdare jaDa\-jagatutx, jiVvajagatutx eMdu atheYRsabeVku. EkeMdare parashivanu averaDanUnx \hbox{tanagiceCx} baMdaMte ADisutAtxne. yaMtarxdiMda hora\-gidudxkoMDu yaMtarxvAhakanu adanunx ADisuvaMte, parashivanu jagatitxna oLagidudxkoMDeV jagatatxnunx niyaMtirxsutAtxne:}
\ullekha{I tarxyAtamxroLage jiVva - aMtarAtAmxdigaLe pAshabadadhxru paramAtamxne pAshamukatxnu.\break I saMcanarida davxMdavx\-rahita tAne namamx guheVshavxraliMgadalilx yaMtarx\-vAhakanenisuvanu (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 741-203);\break jaMtarxgaLADabalalxve? jaMtarxgaLADalariyavu, adeVnu kAraNa? jaMtarxgaLanADisuva yaMtarx\-vAhaka tAnAgi (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 644-193); \hbox{kuDisi} kaDu miVri uguLenutipapx munanx kANiro, ivanADisuva yaMtarxvAhaka kapilasidadhxmalilxkAjuRnanuguLeMdaDe uguLuvenavAvx (savasaM. 4; sidadhxrA. 296-86); Anu nuDidenayAyx niV nuDisidaMte, Anu idedxnayAyx niVnu irisidaMte, jagada yaMtarx\-vAhaka cenanxmalilxkAjuRna sAkeMbananxkakx (savasaM. 5; akakxma. 188-56); enanx nimiRsidavarAru? tirxBuvanaM\-gaLa mADi\-davarAru?... yaMtarxvAhaka niVnu, sakalapAvaka niVnu (savasaM. 8; maDimA. 742-273).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{yaMtarxsayx vAhakaH - yaMtarxvAhaka}}
\end{entry}

unamxniV shakitxreVvoVkAtx AdhAraM voyxVma coVcayxteV ||\\[2pt]
jagatiVcaCxMdasA yukatxM BAradAvxja QuSisatxthA |\\[2pt]
sAthxnamUdhavxRmuKaM vidAyxdf barxhamx ceVshAnameVva ca ||\\[2pt]
AyudhaM ceYva shUlaM sAyxcACxMtayxtiVtA kalApi ca |\\[2pt]
guNasutx shUnayx Eva sAyxtf parxkAshashacxMdirxkAmaNeVH ||\\[2pt]
karaNaM parxkaqtiH porxVkatxM samAnoV vAyureVva ca |\\[2pt]
shorxVtarxM jAcnxneVMdirxyaM porxVkatxmiteyxVteV SoVDashakarxmAtf |\\[2pt]
yakArAkaSxramituyxkatxM na BUtoV na BaviSayxti ||\\[-1pt]

\pauthor{(caM. A., kirx. pA., 8. 38-41; sU. A., kirx. pA., 3. 30)}

parxkAra yoVga\-veMdare shiva-jiVvara kUTavalalx, keVvala citatxvaqtitxniroVdha.}

 anusarisabeVkAda \hbox{mAgaRveV} yoVga:}}

\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{yoVgasayx parxmANaM - yoVgaparxmANaM; yoVgaH parxmANaM yasayx tatf - yoVgaparxmANaM}}

\artha{sAMKayxyoVga, tAraka\-yoVga, amanasakxyoVga eMdu rAjayoVgavu mUru vidha. ipapxtetxYdu tatatxvXgaLa \hbox{jAcnxna} sAMKayxyoVga. manasusx, daqSiTx, pArxNavAyu\-gaLanunx bahimuRKavAgadaMte mudirxsuvu\-danunx ariyuvudu tArakayoVga. aMtaraMgada \hbox{manasasxnunx} neneyadaMte mudirxsuvudu amanasakxyoVga. ivu\-gaLu utatxroVtatxra sherxVSaThxvAdavu:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
soV{\char'263}pi tirxdhA BaveVtf sAMKayxtArakashAcxmanA iti |\\[1pt]
paMcaviMshatitatAtxvXnAM jAcnxnaM tatf sAMKayx ucayxteV ||\\[1pt]
bahimuRdArxparijAcnxnAdoyxVgasAtxraka ucayxteV |\\[1pt]
aMtamuRdArxparijAcnxnAdamanasakx itiVritaH ||\\[1pt]
shAlxGayxH sAMKayxsAtxrakoV{\char'263}yamamanasokxV{\char'263}pi tArakAtf |\\[1pt]
rAjatAvxtf savaRyoVgAnAM rAjayoVga iti samxqqtaH ||\\[-2pt]

\ullekha{A \hbox{shivana} mUtiRyiMda rudarxnAda, A rudarxna mUtiRyiMda viSuNx\-vAda (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 1576-468); urutararahasayxdoLagoVMkAraveV kaNA parashivaM baLikA yakArane sadAshivaM parikisalu vAkAraviVshaM shikArave rudarxM makAraveraDu vara\-biMduviM viSuNxvA nakAraM ...barxhamxM (viVsheYpu. 1-5-55); SaTasxthXla barxhamxmUtiRgaLu - oMdoMdu sAdAKayxkekx obobxbabx adhideVvategaLirutAtxre. ivaru parashivana savxrUpagaLeV eMdu heVLabahudu... 1. parashiva athavA sharaNa athavA jaMgama athavA Atamx, 2. sadAshiva, 3. shiva, 4. rudarx, 5. viSuNx, 6. barxhamx (\hbox{shivAkoV.} 15-25).} \artha{saqSiTxya AraMBakAladalilx barxhamxna\break BUrxmadhayxdiMda utapxtitxgoMDa hanonxMdu jana gaNadeVvate\-gaLalilx obabx:} \ullekha{QuSitatiyaSaTx dikApxla rudarxreVkAdasharf (shivaciM.\break 13-3); aSaTxvasugaLu panenxraDinaru panonxMdurudarxru barxhamx\-roMbatutx neredu Bajisalu (basapu. 9-31).} \artha{Bakatxna sAdhaneyiMda SaTacxkarxgaLalilx nelegoLuLxva AcAra, guru, shiva,\break jaMgama, parxsAda matutx mahAliMgagaLeMba SaDilxMgagaLige\break saMbaMdhisiruva aivatutx jana rudarxru:}

\begin{entry}
\word{rudArxkaSx}\label{rudArxkaSx}
\meaning{\arthanonum{oMdu jAtiya marada biVja. rudarxna \hbox{neVtarx\-gaLiMda} janisida kAraNa rudArxkaSx eMdu hesaru. 
 purANada parxkAra parashivana paMcaviMshatiliVlegaLalilx oMdAda tirxpuradahanaliVlAkAladalilx \hbox{shivanu} tirxpuragaLanunx suTaTx naMtara, caMdarx sUyaR aginx savxrUpa\-gaLAda avana kaNuNxgaLiMda BUmiya\break meVle udurida ashurxbiMdugaLeV rudArxkiSxgaLAduvu. \hbox{parashivana} eDagaNiNx\-niMda shuBarxvaNaRda hadinAru rudArxkiSxgaLu,\break balagaNiNxniMda rakatx\-vaNaRda hanenxraDu rudArxkiSxgaLu matutx\break haNegaNiNxniMda kapupx baNaNxda hatutx rudArxkiSxgaLu utapxtitxyAduvu:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
rudarxsayx nayanAdutapxnAnx rudArxkASx iti loVkeV KAyxyaMteV |\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(baq. jA. u., 7. 16)}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
tirxpurANAM vadhAthARya viBunA shaMBunA purA |\\[2pt]
unimxVlitAni cakUSxMSi divayxM vaSaRsahasarxkamf ||\\[2pt]
uBABAyxM cArupakaSxmXBAyxM patitA jalabiMdavaH |\\[2pt]
ta Eva biMdavoV jAtA mahArudArxkaSxvaqkaSxkAH |\\[2pt]
sAthxvaratavxmanupArxpuH BakAtxnugarxhakAraNAtf ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(ru. jA. u., 4-5; caM. A., kirx. pA., 7. 4-5)}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
shivAcaRnaparoV nitayxM rudArxkaSxmapi dhArayeVtf ||\\[2pt]
rudArxkaSxdhAraNAdeVva mucayxMteV savaRpAtakeYH |\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\smallskip
\pauthor{(si. shi., 7. 45-46)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\ullekha{tirxpurada shiVla divayx sahasarx vaSaR noVDalu A rudarxna akiSxyalilx rakAtxshurxjalabiMdugaLu janisi BUmiya meVle biVLalu mahA\-rudArxkaSx vaqkaSxvAgi terxYloVkAyxnugarxha kAraNavAyitutx noVDA (savasaM. 13; bAlasaM. 335-145); shiradoLiVshApiRta kusumamaM dharisi rudArxkASxBaraNaBUSitaviLasanAgi ...poDa\-vaDuta (basapu. 4-10).} \arthanonum{rudArxkaSxBeVda: \hbox{(a) parashivana}\break sUyaRneVtarxdiMda kapilavaNaRda hanenxraDu, caMdarxneVtarxdiMda biLiya baNaNxda hadinAru, aginxneVtarxdiMda \hbox{kapupx} baNaNxda hatutx bageya rudArxkaSx\-gaLu utapxtitxyAgi, oTuTx mUva\-tetxMTu BeVdagaLive:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
aSaTxtirxMshatfparxBeVdeVna BavaMtuyxtapxtitxBeVdataH ||\\[2pt]
neVtArxtf sUyARtamxnaH shaMBoVH kapilAH dAvxdashoVditAH |\\[2pt]
shevxVtAH SoVDasha saMjAtAH soVmarUpAdivxloVcanAtf ||\\[2pt]
kaqSANx dashavidhA jAtAH vahinxrUpAdivxloVcanAtf |\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(si. shi., 7. 49, 51)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{(A) oMdu muKadiMda hadinAlukx muKada rudArxkaSxdavarege muKaBeVdadiMda hadinAru vidha:}
\ullekha{(ru. jA. u., 27-42; caM. A., kirx. pA., 7. 25-39; si. shi; 7. 54-55; shi. ta. ra., 8. 6. 20-33)}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{(i) utatxma, madhayxma eMdu eraDu vidha. sahaja\-vAgi raMdharxviruvaMtahadudx utatxma, puruSaparxyatanxdiMda raMdharxmADiruvaMtahadudx madhayxma:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
savxyameVva kaqtadAvxraM rudArxkaSxM sAyxdihoVtatxmamf |\\[2pt]
yatutx pwruSayatenxVna kaqtaM tanamxdhayxmaM BaveVtf ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(ru. jA. u., 14-15; caM. A., kirx. pA., 7. 15)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{(I) AkAraBeVdadiMda utatxma, madhayxma, adhama eMdu mUru vidha. nelilxVkAyi gAtarxda rudArxkaSxvu utatxma, bAriVhaNiNxna gAtarxdudx madhayxma, kaDalekALu gAtarxdudx adhama enisive:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
dhAtirxVPalaparxmANaM yatf sherxVSaThxmeVtadudAhaqtamf |\\[2pt]
badariVPalamAtarxM tu madhayxmaM porxVcayxteV budheYH ||\\[2pt]
utatxmaM caNamAtarxM sAyxtf parxkirxyeYSa mayoVcayxteV |\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(ru. jA. u., 8-9; caM. A., kirx. pA., 7. 9-10)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{(u) bArxhamxNa, kaSxtirxya, veYshayx, shUdarx eMba rudArxkaSxvaqkaSxgaLiMda utapxtitxya AdhAradiMda rudArxkaSx\-gaLu nAlukx vidha. biLibaNaNxdudx bArxhamxNa, keMpu baNaNxdudx kaSxtirxya, haLadi baNaNxdudx veYshayx, kapupx\break baNaNxdudx shUdarx vaqkaSxgaLiMda janisive. bArxhamxNAdi\-gaLu karxmavAgi biLi, keMpu, haLadi, kapupx \hbox{baNaNxda} rudArxkaSxgaLanunx dharisabeVku:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
bArxhamxNAH kaSxtirxyAH veYshAyxH shUdArxshecxVti shivAjacnxyA |\\[2pt]
vaqkASx jAtA paqthivAyxM tu tajAjxtiVyAH shuBAkaSxkAH ||\\[2pt]
shevxVtAsutx bArxhamxNA jecnxVyAH kaSxtirxyA rakatxvaNaRkAH |\\[2pt]
piVtA veYshAyxsutx vijecnxVyAH kaqSANxH shUdArx udAhaqtAH ||\\[2pt]
bArxhamxNoV biBaqyAceCxvXVtAnf rakAtxnf rAjA tu dhArayeVtf |\\[2pt]
piVtAnf veYshayxsutx biBaqyAtf kaqSANxnf shUdarxsutx dhArayeVtf ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(ru. jA. u., 10-12; caM. A., kirx. pA., 7. 11-13)}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{rudarxsayx akaSxM iva akaSxM yasayx saH - rudArxkaSxH}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{rudArxkaSxdhAraNa}\label{rudArxkaSxdhAraNa}
\meaning{\arthanonum{rudArxkaSxgaLanunx dharisuvudu. kirxmigaLu \hbox{muTaTxda}, oDedu hoVgirada rudArxkaSxvanunx dharisabeVku. shiKe, \hbox{shirasusx}, kutitxge, vakaSxHsathxla, toVLu, maNikaTuTx hAgU yajocnxVpa\-viVtadaMte shariVradalilx rudArxkaSxgaLanunx dharisabeVku. rudArxkaSx\-dhAraNeyiMda shariVravu shivamayavAgutatxde:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
shiKAyAmeVkameVkAsayxM rudArxkaSxM dhArayeVdf budhaH ||\\[2pt]
divxtirxdAvxdashavakAtxrXNi shirasi tirxVNi dhArayeVtf ||\\[2pt]
SaTftirxMshadAdhxrayeVnUmxdhinxR nitayxmeVkAdashAnanAnf ||\\[2pt]
dashasapatxpaMcavakAtxrXnf SaTf SaTf kaNaRdavxyeV vaheVtf ||\\[2pt]
SaDaSaTxvadanAnf kaMTheV dAvxtirxMshadAdhxrayeVtf sadA ||\\[2pt]
paMcAshadAdhxrayeVdf vidAvxnf catuvaRkAtxrXNi vakaSxsi ||\\[2pt]
tarxyoVdashamuKAnf bAhovxVH dhareVtf SoVDasha SoVDasha ||\\[2pt]
parxteyxVkaMdAvxdashavaheVtf navAsAyxnf maNibaMdhayoVH ||\\[2pt]
catudaRshamuKaM yajacnxsUtarxmaSoTxVtatxraM shatamf ||\\[2pt]
dhArayeVtf savaRkAleV tu rudArxkaSxM shivapUjakaH ||\\
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(ru. jA. u., 17-22; caM. A., kirx. pA., 7. 18-22; si. shi., 7. 54-58)}
\bigskip
\begin{shl}
rudArxkaSxdhAraNAdeVva mucayxMteV savaRpAtakeYH ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(si. shi., 7. 62)}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
liMgaM BUtiM ca rudArxkaSxM yeV deVheV dhArayaMti ca |\\[2pt]
savARMgaliMgasaMyukatxM tadedxVhaM shivamucayxteV |\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(liM. dhA. caM., pu. 266)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\ullekha{`OM ata Eva rudArxkaSxdhAraNAtf rudarxH eMbudAgi rudarx\-padaviyaniVva rudArxkiSxyaM dharisipapx. Bakatxrige sharaNeMbenayayx (savasaM. 6; uripe. 1607-609); paMcashudidxgaLa visatxrisudava\-ralilx shwcAcamanasAnxna BasamxrudArxkaSxdhAraNa kavaca maMtarx kalAnAyxsa dhAyxnAdi racaneMgeyudxdeV Atamxshudidhx enisUdu (savasaM. 9;\break shAMtaviV. 1440-537); BasamxdhAraNA\-naMtaradalilx rudArxkaSx\break\-dhAraNaveV kataRvayxmapupxdAgi tadivxdhAnamaM shudadhx\-sheYvana{\re}yabeVku (viveVka.~73); divayx shiva sidAdhxMta BakitxniSAThxvadhAnapari\-Nataru ...rudArxkaSxdhAraNa catuviRdhashiVlapararigadu muKayxM tirxyAyaSaM enalu (viVsheYpu. 4-50-45); pashicxma cakarxdalilx 1; shiKeyalilx athavA mUdhunxRyalilx 3; shiravanunx baLasi 36; parxti\-yoMdu kaNaRdalilx oMdoMdu; kaMThadalilx 32; ura athavA edeyalilx 56; eraDu toVLugaLalilx 16-16; eraDu muMgeY\-gaLalilx 12-12; vakaSxsathxLadalilx hAra athavA yajocnxVpaviVtavAgi 108 - I parxkAra Bakatxnu rudArxkiSxgaLanunx dharisabeVku (shivAkoV. 95-175)}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{rudArxkaSxdhAraNa - rudArxkaSxdhAraNaM - rudArxkaSxdhAraNaPala - rudArxkaSxdhAraNaM}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{rudArxkaSxdhAraNaPala}\label{rudArxkaSxdhAraNaPala}
\src{saM}
\meaning{\arthanonum{rudArxkaSxdhAraNeyiMda uMTA\-guva Pala. parxtinitayx rudArxkaSxdhAraNeyiMda oMdu koVTi\break goVdAna mADidaSuTx Palavu uMTAgutatxde:}}
\medskip

\begin{entry}

pArxNaliMgamidaM sUkaSxmXM yadaMtaBARvanAmayamf |\\[2pt]
parAtapxraM tu yatf porxVkatxM taqpitxliMgaM taducayxteV ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(si. shi., 6. 49-50)}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
aKaMDameVkaM liMgaM sAyxtf tadeVva guruNA paramf |\\[2pt]
BAvapArxNeVSaTxBeVdeVna tirxdhA BUtaM nagAtamxjeV ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(liM. dhA. caM., pu. 73)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{(I) parabiMdu, paranAda, aparabiMdu, aparanAda eMdu nAlukx vidha. ivugaLa viBAgavu liMgada meVlina matutx keLagina BAgagaLanunx Adhariside. elalxdakikxMta keLagina BAga aparabiMdu, adara meVle aparanAda, adakUkx meVle parabiMdu matutx elalxkUkx meVle paranAda:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
tadeVva shivaliMgaM hi talilxMgaM tu catuviRdhamf |\\[2pt]
parabiMduH paroV nAdashAcxparoV biMdunAdakw |\\[2pt]
upayaRdhoVBAganiSAThxshacxtAvxroV{\char'263}pi surAciRta ||\\[2pt]
adhaH sAyxdaparoV biMdusatxdUdhavxRmaparoV dhavxniH |\\[2pt]
tadUdhavxRM parabiMduH sAyxtf paranAdasatxdUdhavxRgaH ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(caM. A., kirx. pA., 3. 10-11)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{(u) BUmiya vikArasavxrUpadiMda sAvxyaMBuvaliMga, biMdu\-liMga, parxtiSiThxtaliMga, caraliMga, guruliMga eMdu aidu vidha. tAnAgiyeV udaBxvavAda liMga sAvxyaMBuva, biMdu-\-nAdagaLiMda kUDidudu biMduliMga, mahAtamxru matutx shAsatxrXjacnx\-riMda maMtorxVcAcxradiMda sAthxpisidudx parxtiSiThxta\-liMga, soMTa modalAda shariVrada nAnA BAgagaLalilx \hbox{dharisuva}\break nAnA ratanx, loVha, shile, maNuNx modalAdavugaLiMda nimARNa\-vAda liMga caraliMga, vishavxsatxru matutx shiSayxrugaLige gurushariVraveV guruliMga:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
BUvikArANi liMgAni jAcnxtAni parxbarxviVmi vaH |\\[2pt]
savxyaMBuliMgaM parxthamaM biMduliMgaM divxtiVyakamf ||\\[2pt]
parxtiSiThxtaM caraM ceYva guruliMgaM ca paMcamamf |\\[2pt]
savxyaMBUtaM jAtamiti savxyaMBUriti taM viduH ||\\[2pt]
biMdunAdamayaM liMgaM sAthxvaraM jaMgamaM ca yatf ||\\[2pt]
mahadiBxshecxYva shAsatxrXjecnxYH rAjaBishacx mahAdhaneYH |
\end{shl}
\begin{shl}
shilepxVna kalipxtaM liMgaM maMterxVNa sAthxpitaM ca yatf ||\\[2pt]
parxtiSiThxtaM pArxkaqtaM hi pArxkaqteYshavxyaRBoVgadamf |\\[2pt]
kaTAyxdiSu tirxkoVNeVSu liMgamAdhAyxtimxkaM caramf ||\\[2pt]
parxthamaM caraliMgeVSu rasaliMgaM parxkathayxteV |\\[2pt]
shilAliMgaM bArxhamxNAnAM savaRkAmaPalaparxdamf ||\\[2pt]
ratanxliMgaM kaSxtirxyANAM mahArAjayxparxdaM shuBamf |\\[2pt]
savxNaRliMgaM tu veYshAyxnAM mahAdhanavatA parxdamf ||\\[2pt]
maqlilxMgaM ca tu shUdArxNAM mahadeYshavxyaRdaM viduH |\\[2pt]
sAPxTikaM bANaliMgaM ca saveRVSAM savaRkAmadamf ||\\[2pt]
vishavxsAthxnAM tu shiSAyxNAM gururitayxBidhiVyateV |\\[2pt]
tasAmxdugxrushariVraM tu guruliMgaM BaveVdf budhAH ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(kirx. sA., BA-1, 3. 346-401)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{(U) iSaTxliMgavu guruliMga, AcAraliMga; pArxNa\-liMgavu caraliMga, shivaliMga; BAvaliMgavu parxsAdaliMga, mahAliMga eMdu Aru vidha. ivu\-gaLu SaTfsathxlagaLige saMbaMdhi\-sive. AcAraliMgavu Bakatxsathxla, guru\-liMgavu mAheVshavxra\-sathxla, shivaliMgavu parxsAdisathxla, caraliMgavu pArxNa\-liMgisathxla, parxsAdaliMgavu sharaNasathxla matutx mahAliMgavu aikayxsathxlagaLige saMbaMdhisive:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
BAvAdiliMgatirxtayaM divxvidhaM divxvidhaM BaveVtf |\\[2pt]
BAvaliMgaM mahAliMgaparxsAdABiKayxkaM davxyamf ||\\[2pt]
pArxNaliMgaM tathA carashivaliMgadavxyaM BaveVtf |\\[2pt]
iSaTxM tu guruliMgAKayxmAcArAKayxM davxyaM BaveVtf ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(caM. A., kirx. pA., 3. 26-27)}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
AcAraliMgasaMyukatxmaMgaM BakatxsathxlaM mahatf |\\[2pt]
guruliMgasamAyukatxmaMgaM mAheVshavxrasathxlamf ||\\[2pt]
shivaliMgasamAyukatxM parxsAdisathxlamAgatamf |\\[2pt]
aMgaM ca caraliMgeVna saMyukatxM pArxNaliMgi yatf ||\\[2pt]
parxsAdaliMgasaMyukatxmaMgaM hi sharaNasathxlamf |\\[2pt]
mahAliMgasamAyukatxmaMgameYkayxsathxlaM paramf |\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(a. sU., 5. 72-82)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{(Qu) AcAraliMga modalAda Aru liMga\-gaLu matetx talA mUru mUru vidhavAgutatxve. AcAraliMgavu sadAcAra\-liMga, niyatAcAraliMga, gaNAcAraliMga; \hbox{guruliMgavu} diVkASxguruliMga, shikASxguruliMga, anuBAvaguruliMga; shivaliMgavu iSaTxliMga, pArxNaliMga, BAvaliMga; caraliMgavu savxyaliMga, caraliMga, paraliMga; parxsAdaliMgavu shudadhx\-parxsAdaliMga, sidadhxparxsAdaliMga, parxsidadhxparxsAdaliMga; mahAliMgavu piMDajaliMga, aMDajaliMga, biMdAvxkAshaliMga eMdu oTuTx hadineMTu liMgagaLAgutatxve:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
sathxlamAcAraliMgasayx tirxvidhaM shUrxyatAM karxmAtf |\\[2pt]
sadAcArasutx niyaatoV gaNAcArasatxthAparaH ||
\end{shl}
\begin{shl}
diVkASx shikASxnuBAvashacx guruliMgaM tirxdhA BaveVtf |\\[2pt]
shivaliMgasavxrUpaM teV vakASxyXmi shaqNu pAvaRti ||\\[2pt]
iSaTxliMgaM pArxNaliMgaM BAvaliMgamiti tirxdhA ||\\[2pt]
caraliMgasathxlasAyxsayx savxrUpaM kathayAmi teV |\\[2pt]
savxyaM caraM paraM ceVti terxYvidhayxM samupAgatamf ||\\[2pt]
parxsAdaliMgaterxYvidhayxmapi shaqNu varAnaneV |\\[2pt]
shudadhxM sidadhxM parxsidadhxM ca BeVdashecxYSAmathoVcayxteV ||\\[2pt]
mahAliMgasathxlaM cApi tirxdhA BinanxM shaqNu karxmAtf |\\[2pt]
piMDajaM parxthamaM porxVkatxmaMDajaM ca tataH paramf ||\\[2pt]
biMdAvxkAshaM tatoV jecnxVyameVSAM lakaSxNamucayxteV ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(sU. A., kirx. pA., 8-26)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{(e) sithxra, cara, sithxracara, carasithxra, sithxrasithxra, caracara eMdu liMgavu Aru vidha (lakaSxNagaLanunx Adharisida BeVda):}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
sithxraM caraM sithxracaraM carasithxramathAMbikeV |\\[2pt]
sithxrasithxraM caracaraM SaDivxdhaM liMgalakaSxNamf ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(pAra. A., 16. 9)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{(E) utatxma, madhayxma, adhama eMdu liMgavu mUru vidha. ivu talA matetx mUru mUru vidhavAgi oTuTx oMbatutx vidhavAgutatxve. ELu-eMTu-oMbatutx aMgulagaLa liMgavu utatxma; nAlukx-aidu-Aru aMgulagaLa liMgavu \hbox{madhayxma}; oMdu-eraDu-mUru aMgulagaLa liMgavu \hbox{adhama} enisutatxve. niVrina meVlina guLeLxya AkAradudx utatxma\-liMga; koVLimoTeTxya AkAradudx madhayxma; hasuvina hega\-lina AkAradudx madhayxmaliMga (AkArada AdhAradiMda uMTAda BeVda). oMdu, eraDu, mUru, nAlukx, aidu, Aru, ELu, eMTu, oMbatutx aMgula gAtarxda oMbatutx liMga\-gaLu:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
utatxmaM madhayxmaM niVcamiti liMgaM tirxdhoVcayxteV |\\[2pt]
ESevxVkeVna tirxdhA tadavxdukatxmaMgulamAnataH ||\\[2pt]
navASaTxsapAtxMgulakaM liMgaM sherxVSaThxM tathA samxqqtamf |\\[2pt]
SaTfpaMcakacatumARnaM madhayxmaM tirxvidhaM samxqqtamf ||\\[2pt]
tirxdevxyXVkAMgulamAniVyaM tirxvidhaM tasayx saMsakxqqtamf |\\[2pt]
EvaM navavidhaM porxVkatxM yathA karxmAtf ||\\[2pt]
utatxmaM budubxdAkAraM madhayxmaM kukukxTAMDavatf |\\[2pt]
adhamaM goVkakutfparxKayxmiti liMgaM tirxdhA samxqqtamf ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(sheY. ra., BA-2, 4. 52-55)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{(ai) aKaMDaliMga, BAvaliMga, pArxNaliMga, iSaTxliMga, paqthivxVrUpada AcAraliMga, jalarUpada guruliMga, teVjoVrUpada shivaliMga, vAyurUpada caraliMga, AkAshamayavAda parxsAdaliMga, AtamxtatatxvXrUpada mahA\-liMga-eMdu hatutx vidha liMga\-gaLu:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
iSaTxliMgaparxkaqtikaM AcAraguruliMgakeV |\\[2pt]
pAthiRvApeyxV iti porxVketxV sheYvAgamavishAradeYH ||
\end{shl}

\begin{shl}
pArxNaliMgaparxkaqtikeV teVjoVvAyumayeV tathA |\\[2pt]
shivaliMgacarABiKeyxV liMgeV devxV varavaNiRni ||\\[2pt]
voyxVmaparxkaqtikaM liMgaM pArxsAdAKayxM mahatatxramf |\\[2pt]
AtamxtatatxvXmayaM porxVkatxM mahAliMgaM mahatatxramf ||\\[2pt]
iti sidAdhxMtasheVKaravacaneVnoVkAtxnAM dashavidhaliMgAnAmf...\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(liM. dhA. caM., pu. 73)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{(o) BAvaliMga, pArxNaliMga, iSaTxliMga eMdu liMgasathxlavu mUru vidha. I mUru liMga\-gaLu matetx talA eraDeraDAgutatxve. BAvaliMgavu mahAliMga, parxsAdaliMga; pArxNaliMgavu caraliMga, shivaliMga; iSaTxliMgavu guruliMga, AcAraliMga eMdu talA eraDeraDAgi oTuTx Aru liMgasathxlagaLAgutatxve:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
liMgasathxlaM tirxdhA jecnxVyaM tadeBxVdoV vaNayxRteV karxmAtf ||\\[2pt]
parxthamaM BAvaliMgaM sAyxdf divxtiVyaM pArxNaliMgakamf |\\[2pt]
taqtiVyamiSaTxliMgaM sAyxditeyxVtatf tirxvidhaM samxqqtamf ||\\[2pt]
EkameVkaM sathxlaM BUyoV divxvidhaM divxvidhaM BaveVtf ||\\[2pt]
mahAliMgaM parxsAdAKayxM liMgamituyxBayasathxlamf |\\[2pt]
BAvaliMgaM BavateyxVva sAvxnuBUtiparxmANataH ||\\[2pt]
tathA ca caraliMgaM ca shivaliMgamiti davxyamf |\\[2pt]
pArxNaliMgaM BavateyxVva tAtapxyARthoRV na saMshayaH ||\\[2pt]
guruliMgaM tathA{\char'263\char'263}cAraliMgamituyxBayasathxlamf |\\[2pt]
iSaTxliMgaM BavateyxVva satayxmukatxmidaM mayA ||\\[2pt]
mahAliMgaM parxsAdAKayxliMgaM ca caraliMgakamf |\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(a. sU., 3. 16-21)}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
BAvAdiliMgatirxtayaM divxvidhaM divxvidhaM BaveVtf |\\[2pt]
BAvaliMgaM mahAliMgaparxsAdABiKayxkaM davxyamf ||\\[2pt]
pArxNaliMgaM tathA carashivaliMgadavxyaM BaveVtf |\\[2pt]
iSaTxM tu guruliMgAKayxmAcArAKayxM davxyaM BaveVtf |\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(caM. A., kirx. pA., 3. 26-27)}

\meaning{\arthanonum{aMgada meVle liMga dharisiruva kAya (shariVra); shariVra guNagaLanunx biTuTx shivatatatxvXgaLanunx tananxlilx aLavaDisikoMDiruvavanu:}}

\begin{entry}
\word{liMgakAyasharaNa}\label{liMgakAyasharaNa}
\src{va}
\meaning{\arthanonum{pArxNaliMgisathxlavanunx muTiTxruva \hbox{sharaNanu}, liMgavanunx keVvala karasathxla athavA urasathxladalalxSeTxV alalx, savARMgagaLalilxyU parxtiSAThxpisikoMDirutAtxne. hiVgiru\-vudariMda, yAvudeV rUpa, rasa, gaMdha, itAyxdi avana jAcnxneVM\-dirxyagaLanunx tagaluva munanxveV liMgakekx tagalutatxde. tAnu naDeyuva munanx liMgaveV naDeyutatxde; tAnu nuDiyuva \hbox{munanx} liMgaveV nuDiyutatxde; tAnu taqpitxpaTuTxkoLuLxva munanx \hbox{liMgakekx} taqpitxyAgutatxde. iMtaha sharaNa liMgakAyasharaNa athavA kAyavanenxlAlx liMgavanAnxgi mADikoMDiruva sharaNa:}

\begin{entry}
\word{liMgakeSxVtarx}\label{liMgakeSxVtarx}
\meaning{\arthanonum{parameVshavxranigiruva para, gUDha, shariVrasathx, liMgakeSxVtarx matutx anAdi eMba aidu bageya saMjecnx\-gaLalilx oMdu; parxpaMcada samasatx vataRnegaLigU kAraNa\-vAda oMdu bageya sithxti:}
\ullekha{liMgakeSxVtarxmanAdiyeMba paMcasaMjecnxyanuLaLx guruviniMdAda kAraNa guruviMda paravilalxveMdu orevutitxve noVDA (savasaM. 9; haDa{a}. 942-290); `paraM \hbox{gUDhaM} shariVrarasathxM liMgakeSxVtarxmanAdivatf~| yathAdimiVshavxraM teVjaM talilxMgaM paMcasaMjacnxkaM (savasaM. 11; toVMTasi. 35-15); paraM gUDhameMdatishaya shariVrasathxveMdu liMga\-keSxVtarxveMdanAdiyumenipapx nutavAdanAdiyiVshavxrana teVjasasxmagarxteya liMgavaneYdu ku{\ru}hiMdalipupxdeY (viVsheYpu. 1-3-19); sakalacarAcaraMgaLane tananxMgadiM saqjisi \hbox{vilayakekx} kAraNamAda tuMgasukeSxVtarxmeMdenipa kAraNade liMgakeSxVtarx\-meMdenisitu (cebapu. 60-38).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{liMgasayx keSxVtarxM - liMgakeSxVtarxM}}

\begin{entry}

\ullekha{\hbox{liMgaGArxNa\-dalilx} liMgakekx liMgagaMdhavanapiRsi liMgaparxsAdava garxhisutipaRnayayx \hbox{nimamx} parxsAdi (savasaM. 14; SaNumxKa. 663-302).}}

\ullekha{A liMga\-gaqhaMgaLige maMtarxdhAyxnadiMda sUtarxva racisi lAMCanayukatx\-vAda pAvana yAvudAdaDeyU sariye, gurupAdoVdakadalilx toLedu maDikeya mADi... cidaCxnamahAparatatatxvXmUtiRya mUtaRva mADisuvudayayx (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 921-286).}}

\begin{entry}

\ullekha{liMgaGArxNasutx\break \hbox{GArxNashacx} liMgeVna saha vataRteV liMgaM manoVgataM vApi iteyxVteYH sahaBoVjanaM || (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 227-71); GArxNadiM sugaMdha dugaRMdhavanaridu mahA\-gaMdhadalU vatiRsi GArxNada keYyalU liMgaGArxNakekx apiRsuvalilx GArxNoVdakavu\break (savasaM. 6; uripe. 1426-491); liMga\-GArxNadalilx liMgakekx\break liMgagaMdhavanapiRsi, liMgaparxkArada garxhisutipaRnayAyx nimamx parxsAdi (savasaM. 14; SaNumxKa. 663-302).}}

\newmeaning{\ni{liMgasayx GArxNaM - liMgaGArxNaM; liMgaM yasimxnf GArxNeV tatf - liMgaGArxNaM}}

\begin{entry}
\word{liMgajaMgama}\label{liMgajaMgama}
\meaning{\artha{nAdadiMda nishacxlitavAdadudx liMga, biMdu\-viniMda nishacxlitavAdadudx jaMgama nAda-biMdugaLa misharxNa\-vAda sherxVSaThx liMga:}}

nAdabiMdusamAyukatxM sherxVSaThxM talilxMgajaMgamamf ||\\[-1pt]

\begin{entry}
\word{liMgadeVhi}\label{liMgadeVhi}
%\src{saM}
\meaning{\artha{iSaTxliMga dharisiruvavanu. shivanige shariVra\-vanunx saMpUNaRvAgi samapiRsida yoVgi. savARMgagaLu \hbox{liMgaveV} Agiruva shivayoVgi:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
savaRM liMgamayaM rUpaM liMgeVna samamashunxteV ||\\[2pt]
savARMgaM liMgameVva sAyxdananxpAnAdayxmapiRtamf |\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(a. sU., 7. 65-66)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\ullekha{Bakatxna hasatx muTiTx pAvanaveMbananxkakx tAnu BaviyeV Ata[na] liMga\-deVhiyeMteMbe, liMgacAriyeMteMbe (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 355-113).} \artha{liMgadeVhavanunxLaLxvanu; sUkaSxmXshariVri:} \ullekha{liMgava dharisipapxnAgi A mahAmahimaneV liMgadeVhi liMga\-kAyanu liMgapArxNanu (savasaM. 6; uripe. 1535-555); deVhaguNagaLaLidu liMgadeVhiyAda sharaNanu bahiraMgada baLake mAyAmoVhavanunx japidanu (avacaM. 290-1303).}}

\begin{entry}
\word{liMgadorxVha}\label{liMgadorxVha}
\src{va}
\meaning{\arthanonum{liMgakekx mADuva dorxVha; gurukAruNayxdiMda iSaTxliMgavanunx paDedanaMtaravU tananx pUvARsharxmada AcAragaLanunx Acarisuvudu:}
\ullekha{gurukAruNayxva haDeda Bakatxnu hiMdaNa pUvARsharxyava berasidaDe gurudorxVha liMgadorxVha jaMgamadorxVha (savasaM. 1; basava.\break 768-195); gurukAruNayxva paDeda Bakatxru hiMdaNa pUvAR\-sharxyava berasalAgadu berasidare AcAradorxVha guru\-dorxVha liMga\-dorxVha (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1548-570).}}
%\ullekha{mututx niVralilx huTiTx matetx niVrapupxde... gurudorxVha liMgadorxVha jaMgamadorxVha... (savasaM. 1; basava. 768-195); tanuvapiRtaveMdaDe gurudorxVha... manavapiRtaveMdaDe liMgadorxVha... (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 1230-363); AcAraveMbudu kUralagu, tapipx baMdaDe pArxNava tagaluvudu... liMgadorxVhava keVLi tAnu pArxNabiDuvude... (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 971-311); guruveMdu idiriTaTxlilx gurudorxVha... liMgaveMdu saMdeVhisidalilx liMgadorxVha... (savasaM. 8; parxsABoV. 44-20); saMsAravanopipxsida nivARNigomemx maThaveMdalilx gurudorxVha... mAniniyeMdalilx liMgadorxVha, baMgAraveMdalilx jaMgamadorxVha... (savasaM. 12; deVshikeVM. 1064-313).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{liMgasayx dorxVhaH - liMgadorxVhaH}}

\begin{entry}
\word{liMgadorxVhi}\label{liMgadorxVhi}
\src{va}
\meaning{\arthanonum{liMgakekx dorxVha bageyuvavanu; jaMgama\-ralilx meYligeyanunx huDukuvavanu:}
\ullekha{kari sUkaranaMte aginxyalilx suDu eMba liMgadorxVhigeVko parxsAda? aMtapapx paramapAtakarige pAdoVdaka parxsAdava koDalAgadu (savasaM. 1;\break basava. 1173-321); karasathxladalilx liMgaviDidu sahaBoVjana\-veMdu oMdAgi uMDu tamamx oDala horeva liMgadorxVhigaLa noVDi nagutitxdeRnayAyx guheVshavxrA (savasaM. 2. alalxma. 916-274); hesarilalxda aparxmANamahimananu hesariTuTx, kareva liMgadorxVhiya mAta keVLalAgadu (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 578-176); liMgeYkayxrenisikoMDu aMgavikArakekx tiruguva liMgadorxVhigaLa muKava noVDalAgadu kANA (savasaM. 5; amurA. 633-198).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{liMgasayx dorxVhaH asimxnf asitx iti - liMgadorxVhiV}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}

\src{kA}
\meaning{\arthanonum{iSaTxliMgavanunx dharisidavanu; liMgavaMta; \hbox{viVrasheYva}:} \ullekha{liMgadharAdharaparxtati liMgamahiVruDapaMkitx liMga\-tiVthaRMgaLa rAji ...kaNegxhediduRdu (vaqSavi. 11-23).}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{liMgadhAraka}\label{liMgadhAraka}
\meaning{\arthanonum{iSaTxliMgadhAri:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
dhaqtashirxVBUtirudArxkaSxH parxyatoV liMgadhArakaH |\\[2pt]
japeVtfpaMcAkaSxriVvidAyxM shivatatatxvX parxboVdhiniVmf ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\smallskip
\pauthor{(si. shi., 8.1)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\ullekha{uLida SaTasxthXlamAgaRvariyada liMgadhAraka shishuvAgali, shakitx\-yAgali, doDaDxvarAgali A gaduRgeya tegedu liMgakekx apiRsikoLaLxbeVkalalxde baTaTxletatxlAgadu (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 800-230); ayAyx, sahajaliMgadhAraka Bakatx upAdhiBakatxru [viBUtiya] gurupAdoVdakadalilx samimxsharxva mADi dharisuvadayAyx (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 936-299); iMtiV SaDivxdha\-sAthxnaMgaLalilx kalipxsi liMgava dharisuvarelalx SaTfsheYvavAdigaLu,\break ivaru liMgadhArakaralalx (savasaM. 10; kADasi. 60-43); liMga\-dhArakaBakAtxnAM liMgabAhayxsatiVsutAH | AliMgitAH cuMbitAshacx rwravaM narakaM varxjeVtf || (savasaM. 14; mUrusA. 35-34); utatxmAMgABaraNa shAsanavetatx kakaSx karasathxla girxVvoVtatxmAMgoVra\-sathxlAdhikaliMgadhArakaru ...rAjisalu (basapu. 6-15).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{liMgaM dhArayati iti - liMgadhArakaH; liMgasayx dhAraNaM asitx asimxnf iti - liMgadhArakaH}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{liMgadhArakaBakatx}\label{liMgadhArakaBakatx}
\meaning{\arthanonum{upAdhiBakatx, nirupAdhiBakatx matutx liMgadhAraka\-Bakatx eMba tirxvidha Bakatxralilx obabx; shirasusx, haNe, koraLu, eraDu bAhugaLu, haqdaya, nABi matutx paqSaThx - eMba shariVrada eMTu eDegaLalilx viBUti\-dhAraNa mADuva Bakitx:}
\ullekha{iMtaha AcArayukatxvAda goVvina sagaNiya ...kirxyAginxyiMda dahisida bUdiya dhULa pAdoVdaka\-dalilx shoVdhisi adaraLage tiLiya tegedu GaTiTxya mADi pUvaR\-dalilx (guru) heVLida vacanoVkitx\-yiMda dharisida liMgadhAraka\-BakatxMge gurudiVkeSxyuMTAguvudayAyx (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 932-295); viBUtidhAraNada sathxLagaLu - liMgadhAraka Bakatxru 8 sAthxnagaLalilx dharisuvudu (shivAkoV. 94-171).}}
%\ullekha{ayAyx, kirxyAviBUtiya dharisida Bakatxnu... liMgadhAraka BakatxriMda gurupAdoVdaka modalAgi... (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 920-284); sacicxdAnaMda barxhomxVpadeVsha BakatxmaheVshavxraru... liMgadhArakaBakAtxnAM liMgabAhayxsatiVsutAH... (savasaM. 14; mUrusA. ???-???).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{liMgadhArakashacx asw Bakatxshacx - liMgadhArakaBakatxH}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{liMgadhAraNa}\label{liMgadhAraNa}
\meaning{\arthanonum{shirxVguruvu diVkASxkAladalilx anugarxhisida iSaTx\-liMga, pArxNaliMga, BAvaliMga eMba mUru vidhada liMga\-gaLa dhAraNe. liMgadhAraNeyu bAhayx matutx ABayxMtara eMdu eraDu vidha. citf rUpada parashivaliMgavanunx citatxdalilx (manasisxnalilx) dharisuvudu ABayxMtaraliMgadhAraNe. mUlA\-dhAra, \hbox{haqdaya}, BUrxmadhayxdalilx niraMtaravAgi joyxVti\-liRMgada anusaMdhAna mADuvudeV aMtaliRMgadhAraNe athavA ABayxMtaraliMgadhAraNe. bAhayxshariVradalilx dharisuva iSaTxliMgaveV bAhayxliMgadhAraNa:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
liMgadhAraNamAKAyxtaM divxdhA savARthaRsAdhakeYH |\\[1pt]
bAhayxmABayxMtaraM ceVti muniBiHmoVRkAMkiSxBiH ||\\[1pt]
cidUrxpaM paramaM liMgaM shAMkaraM savaRkAraNamf |\\[1pt]
yatatxsayx dhAraNaM citetxV tadAMtaramudAhaqtamf ||\\[1pt]
AdhAreV haqdayeV vA{\char'263}pi BUrxmadheyxV vA niraMtaramf |\\[1pt]
joyxVtiliRMgAnusaMdhAnamf AMtaraM liMgadhAraNamf ||\\[1pt]
iSaTxliMgamidaM sUthxlaM yadf bAheyxV dhAyaRteV tanw ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\smallskip
\pauthor{(si. shi., 6. 30, 31, 39, 49)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\ullekha{aMgasaMgadalagaladaMtire liMgadhAraNavAdudAdaDe maMgaLA\-tamxkanAtaneY (parxBuliV. 16-29); aMgada meVle liMga susAvxyata\-vadeMtAdudenalAgi liMgadhAraNavenipanaMta mahimA\-sathxlavadAgutidaRpudu (viVsheYpu. 8-125-14).}}
%\newmeaning{\ni{liMgadhAraNa - liMgadhAraNaM - liMgasayx dhAraNaM liMgadhAraNaM}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{liMgadhAraNasathxla}\label{liMgadhAraNasathxla}
\meaning{\arthanonum{aMgaSaTAkxMtagaRta Bakatxsathxlada hadineYdu avAMtarasathxlagaLalilx oMdu. shirxVguruviniMda diVkeSxyanunx \hbox{paDedu}, liMgavanunx sadA shariVrada meVle dharisabeVku. \hbox{liMgada} savxrUpa-BeVdagaLu, liMgadhAraNakarxma-sAthxnagaLu, sitxrXV-\-puruSarelalxrU liMgadhAraNeyanunx mADabeVkeMdu nirUpi\-suva sathxla:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
avAMtarasathxlAnayxtarx pArxhuH paMcadashoVtatxmAH |\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(si. shi., 5. 27)}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
atarx BakatxsathxleV avAMtarasathxlAni paMcadasheVtAyxhuH |\\[2pt]
tAni kAniVtayxtarx piMDateVtAyxdi |\\[2pt]
piMDasathxlamf... liMgadhAraNasathxlamf... |\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(si. shi. tatatxvX. parx., 5. 60)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\ullekha{gurukaruNasathxla, liMgadhAraNasathxla, viBUtisathxla rudArxkiSxsathxla, paMcA\-kaSxrisathxla, Bakitxsathxla... I hadineYdu BakatxsathxlaMgaLu (savasaM. 14; SaNumxKa. 780-355); A mahAmahimanaMtadA sUthxlatanu vilasita vayxvahAramaM tavisutaM sadAcAra\-sadavxtaRnege sAdhanavadAgi nalidu muMteyaMgada meVle liMgasusAvxyata\-vadeMtAdudenalAgi ...liMgadhAraNasathxlavalA (viVsheYpu. 8-125-14,15); gurukaruNAnivxta mahAtamxMge paMca\-BUtAtamxka sUthxladeVha dhamaRMgaLaM pariharisi sadAcAra sAdhaniVBUta deVhada meVle liMgadhAraNavanesagalade liMga\-dhAraNasathxlavAdudu (keYvasha. 16-1 sUtarxM).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{liMgadhAraNaM iti sathxlaM - liMgadhAraNasathxlaM}}
\vskip 3pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\SEE{tirxvidha diVkASx, liMgadhAraNa}}}
\end{entry}
%\artha{nUroMdu sathxlagaLalilx oMdu; deVhAdi guNagaLiMda dUravAgi, shariVradalilx diVkASxvidhipUvaRkavAgi liMgavanunx dharisuva haMta.}

\begin{entry}
\word{liMgadhAraNe}\label{liMgadhAraNe}
\src{kA}
\meaning{\artha{viVrasheYva guruvina hasatxmasatxka saMyoV\-gada mUlaka shiSayxnige liMgadiVkeSx koTATxga mAtarx shiSayxnu liMga\-vanunx dharisabahudu. moVkASxthiRyAgi baMdavari\-gaSeTxV guruvu diVkeSx koDabeVku:}
\ullekha{liMgadhAraNeyanAli\-sidevA liMgamaM dharisidAtana susanAmxgaRdinacari vataRne esakavAvudu (viVsheYpu. 7-111-16).} \artha{diVkASxkAla\-dalilx shirxVguruvu oMdu liMgavanunx tegedukoMDu \hbox{aBiSeVka}, pArxNaparxtiSAThxpane modalAda vidhigaLiMda adanunx shudidhx\-goLisi,\break hasatxmasatxka saMyoVgadiMda shiSayxna citakxleyanunx maMtarx\-pUvaRkavAgi AvAhane mADi, A liMgakekx samAyoVji\-sutAtxne. hiVge pArxNaparxtiSeThxyAda iSaTxliMgakekx pArxNaliMga-\-BAvaliMgagaLa anusaMdhAnavAgutatxde. sUthxlashariVradalilx iSaTxliMga, sUkaSxmXshariVradalilx pArxNaliMga, kAraNashariVradalilx BAvaliMgagaLa sAthxpaneyeV liMgadhAraNeya sAthxnagaLu. aMteyeV iSaTxliMgavanunx masatxka, koraLu, kakeSx (kaMkuLu) edeya meVle, kukiSx (udarada meVle), athavA hasatxdalilx dharisabeVku. nABiya keLage, jaTeya tudiyalilx, tirxkasAthxnadalilx (benunx), malasAthxna\-gaLalilx liMgavanunx dharisabAradu:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
savaRlakaSxNasaMpanenxV tasimxnf liMgeV vishoVdhiteV |\\[2pt]
piVThasithxteV{\char'263}BiSiketxV ca gaMdhapuSApxdipUjiteV ||\\[2pt]
maMtarxpUteV kalAM sheYviVM yoVjayeVdivxdhinA guruH |\\[2pt]
shiSayxsayx pArxNamAdAya liMgeV tatarx nidhApayeVtf ||\\[2pt]
talilxMgaM tasayx tu pArxNeV sAthxpayeVdeVkaBAvataH |\\[2pt]
EvaM kaqtAvx guruliRMgaM shiSayxhasetxV nidhApayeVtf ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(si. shi., 6. 22-25)}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
iSaTxM sUthxlatanoVH porxVkatxM pArxNaM sUkaSxmXtanoVH samxqqtamf |\\[2pt]
BAvAKayxM kAraNaseyxYvaM tanutarxyagataM tarxyamf ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(caM. A., kirx. pA., 3. 45)}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
mUdhinxR vA kaMThadeVsheV vA kakeSxV vakaSxHsathxleV{\char'263}pi vA |\\[2pt]
kukwSx hasatxsathxleV vApi dhArayeVlilxMgameYshavxramf ||\\[2pt]
nABeVradhasAtxlilxMgasayx dhAraNaM pApakAraNamf |\\[2pt]
jaTAgerxV tirxkaBAgeV ca malasAthxneV na dhArayeVtf ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(si. shi., 6. 52-53; shi. ta. ra., 9. 8. 69-70)}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{liMgadhAri}\label{liMgadhAri}
\meaning{\arthanonum{shariVrada meVle liMgavanunx dharisidavanu. sadA shuci\-yAgiruvudu liMgadhAriya lakaSxNa:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
liMgadhAriV sadA shudodhxV nijaliMgaM manoVramamf |\\[2pt]
BUtirudArxkaSxsaMyukotxV liMgadhAriV sadA shuciH |\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(si. shi., 6. 54; 9. 1; 6. 63)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\ullekha{liMgadhAriV mahAyoVgiV carapAdoVdakaM vinA | dineVna dashajanAmxni mAseVna shatajanamxsu || (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1344-475); liMgadhAriV mahAliMgaM na BeVdasatxtarx tatarx daqshayxteV | sadfdaqtotxV BaqtayxrUpashacx satayxM satayxM samoV na ca || (savasaM. 6; uripe. 1363-447); nABeVradhoV liMgadhAriV pApeVna casa yujayxteV | nABoyxdhevxVR liMgadhAriV casa swBAgayx\-jAcnxnavadhaRnaM|| (savasaM. 13; bAlasaM. 336-150).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{liMga dharateV iti - liMgadhAriV}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{liMgadhAridivxja}\label{liMgadhAridivxja}
\src{saM}
\meaning{\arthanonum{liMgavanunx dharisiruva bArxhamxNa, \hbox{viVrasheYva}:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
sadfvaqtitxmaBipanAnxya liMgineV ceVtarAya ca |\\[2pt]
deVyamAhumaRhArAja uBAveVtw tapasivxnw ||
\end{shl}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
iti BiVSamxvacaneVna liMgadhAridivxjAnAM dAnapAtarxtA\\[2pt]

manaHpArxNAdigaLanunx liMgada sati eMdu tiLiyu\-tAtxne. satiyu tananx
patiya suKakAkxgi heVge tanenxlalx\-vanUnx samapiRsikoLuLxtAtxLeyoV

apiRsikoLuLxtAtxne. AdudariMda avanu liMgada sati. liMgavu avana pati:} \ullekha{keraLi munidu GuDu\hbox{GuDisi} gajiRsaloDane keraLalamamxde aMji oLagaDagida. sharaNasati liMgapatiyeMba BASe (savasaM. 1; basava. 1255-345).}}

(savasaM. 5; akakxmamx. 552-172); liMgadoLagiduR, liMgakekx liMgavanapiRsi liMgaparxsAdadoLage, oDagUDi mahAparxsAdiyAgi (savasaM. 11; toVMTasi. 650-290); liMgakekx mUru veVLe apiRta mADuvudu liMgaparxsAdavu (shivAkoV. 84-162).}}

(savasaM. 3;\break cenanxba. 920-284); makAra-shikAra-vakAra; anAmika-\-madhAyxMgula-tajaRni modalAda tirxvidhaMgaligaLalilx, tirxvidhaliMgamaMtarxgaLiMda iSaTxmahAliMgAroVpitava mADi BoVgisabalalxDe, acacx savxyaMBu parxsAdaliMga sharaNareMbe noVDa (savasaM. 10; gurusi. 737-425); OM hArxM nayeMbiduve sadoyxVjAtamuKavanuLALxcAraliMga ...OM harxH namaH shivAyayenu\break\-tatxlaMtamuRKada mahAliMgApiRtAyamaviMtu taqpitx supadAthaR\-vanapiRsuvudAda{\char'273\char'304\char'301} liMgamaMtarxMgaLeY (viVsheYpu. 8-129-21).}}

(savasaM. 2; alalxma. 733-201); liMgasharaNana paMceVMdirxyaMgaLu liMgamuKavAgi niMdu (savasaM. 6; Adayayx. 1082-334); deVvA \hbox{piMDava} taMdu mAnavayoVniyalilx huTiTxdaDeVno? liMga\-sharaNanu narara yoVniyalilx huTiTxdAtaneV alalx (savasaM. 9; hAvina. 1102-349); liMgAcArakirxVyalilx Acarisutitxdadx liMga\-sharaNaru tAvu shivanAdeveMba nishacxyaBAvadiMda tAvu shivaneMba BAvava nidhaRrisiharu (liMgaliV. 183-8).}}

\begin{entry}
\word{liMgashariVra}\label{liMgashariVra}

\begin{entry}
\word{liMgashudidhx}\label{liMgashudidhx}
\meaning{\artha{shivapUjAsamayadalilx Bakatxnu anusarisabeVkAda Atamx, sAthxna, darxvayx, liMga matutx maMtarxgaLige saMbaMdhapaTaTx aidu bageya neYmaRlayxgaLalilx oMdu; shivaliMgada meVlina nimARlayx\-puSapxgaLanunx tegedu, pavitarxjalavanunx liMgada meVle \hbox{porxVkiSxsi} mADuva shudidhx:}
\ullekha{anAmika madhayxmegaLa madhayxdalilx\break naviVna\-kusumaviDidu aMguSaThx tajaRnigaLiM modala \hbox{nimARlayxmaM} tayxjisi liMgapiVThamaM vAriyiM parxkASxlanaMgeYvudeV liMgashudidhxyenisuvudu (viveVka. 93).}
\artha{diVkASxkAladalilx guruvu tananx shiSayxnige iSaTxliMgavanunx anugarxhisuvAga guruvina karasapxshaRdiMda liMgada shilABAvavu niVgi, adakekx uMTAguva pavitarxte:}
\ullekha{nakAramAtamxshudidhxshacx makAraM sAnxnashoVdhanaM~| shikAraM liMgashudidhxshacx vAkAraM darxvayxshoVdhanaM || yakAraM maMtarxshudidhxshacx paMcashudidhxH parxkiVtiRtA | (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 851-253); matatxmA shivapUjAvidhige deVsha kAla sAthxna darxvayx parxyoVjanAdigaLaM... kirxyegaLaM, Atamxshudidhx sAthxna\-shudidhx darxvayxshudidhx [liMgashudidhx] maMtarx (savasaM. 9; shAMtaviV. 1400-537),}}
\vskip 5pt

\begin{entry}

AcAraliMga, guruliMga, shivaliMga, jaMgamaliMga, parxsAdaliMga matutx mahAliMga eMba Aru vidha liMgagaLige saMbaMdhisida sathxla:}

\begin{entry}

\begin{shl}

\begin{shl}

AnaMdamAtarxmanayoVH saMyoVga iti kiVtiRtaH ||\\[-1pt]

\medskip
\pauthor{(a. sU., 5. 28)}
\smallskip

\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(a. sU., 5. 29)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{maMtarx-kirxyegaLa anuSAThxna. maMtarx eMdare liMga, kirxye eMdare aMga, iveraDara anuSAThxnaveV liMgAMgasaMyoVga. parxkaqti-puruSara perxVrakatavxdiMdAguva sAkASxtf Ishavxra. aMga parxkaqti, liMga puruSa. ivaribabxra perxVrakatavxdiMdAguva sAkASxtf IshavxraneV saMyoVga:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}

tayoVH perxVrakaBAveVna saMyoVgaH savxyamiVshavxraH ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(a. sU., 5. 31)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{parxNavada (OMkAra) aMsha. OMkAradalilxruva a-u-ma eMba vaNaRgaLu karxmavAgi liMga-aMga-saMyoVgarUpa\-vAgive:}}

\begin{shl}

\pauthor{(a. sU., 5 32)}
\smallskip

\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(a. sU., 5. 33)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{shabadx matutx athaRgaLa saMyoVga. shabadxvu aMga, athaRvu liMga. averaDara jAcnxna saMyoVga:}}

\begin{shl}

\begin{shl}

liMgaM paraM haqdagxganaM tadaMgakamf\\[2pt]

\medskip
\pauthor{(a. sU., 5. 35)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{aMgeY meVlaNa liMga hAgU kaNiNxna noVTa iveraDu kUDi\-dalilx; haqdayapiVThada cililxMga matutx manasisxna nenahu iveraDu kUDidalilx; aMgeY meVlaNa iSaTxliMga matutx shiradalilxruva paratatatxvXmUtiR enisikoLuLxva jaMgama iveraDu kUDidalilx; liMgAMgakUTa, liMgAMgasaMyoVga enisutatxde.}}

\begin{entry}

soV{\char'263}yamAtAmx savxyaM sAkASxciCxvasAyxMshoV{\char'263}pi tatatxvXtaH |\\[2pt]
vayxvahAradashAyAM tu saMsAriVva parxkAshateV ||\\[2pt]

\begin{entry}

\src{va}
\meaning{\arthanonum{liMgaveMdare (parashivaneMdare) anaMta, aviraLa, aKaMDa `citf'; aMga eMdare shudadhx\-vAda `Atamx'; sAmarasayx eMdare oMdeV BAva iruvudu. `shudadhxvAda Atamxkekx tAneV parashivaneMba BAva iruvudu' eMbudu `liMgAMga sAmarasayx'da athaR.}}
\vskip 3pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad aMganu mUlataH parashivana aMga (BAga); A sithxtiyalilx avanu

 vayxkitx' eMdu tapupx tiLididAdxne; deVheVMdirxya\-gaLa swKayxveV
 jiVvanada muKayx guri eMdU BarxmisidAdxne; I BarxmAdavxyagaLiMdAgi
 aneVka riVtiya kamaRgaLanunx mADi, avugaLa Palavanunx anuBavisalu
 matetx matetx huTiTx barutitxdAdxne. marujanamxdalilxyU adeV Barxme
 iruvudariMda, matetx punajaRnamxkekx agatayxvAda kamaRgaLanenxV
 mADutitxdAdxne. hiVge Bavacakarxdalilx naraLuvudu avanige
 sahisadAdAga adariMda horabaralu nidhaRrisi, mAgaRdashaRnakAkxgi
 guru\-vina baLi baMdu, liMgadiVkeSxya mUlaka AdhAyxtimxka jiVvana
 AraMBisi, koneyalilx liMgAMgasAmarasayxvanunx gaLisutAtxne. I
 gaLike marugaLikeyeV horatu, hosa gaLikeyeVnalalx.}}
\vskip 4pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad AdhAyxtimxka sAdhaneya mUlaka gaLisikoMDa liMgAMga\-sAmarasayxvu
 moVkaSxda inonxMdu hesaru. saMsAradalilxruvavanige marevu,
 parxteyxVkatABAva, punajaRnamx matutx malatarxyagaLu
 irutatxve. moVkaSxveMdare ivugaLiMda biDugaDe. AdhAyxtimxka
 sAdhaneya mUlaka jAcnxna paDedavanige marevu ilalx; marevu
 ilalxdavanige tananx nijasavxrUpa tiLidiruvudariMda avanige yAva
 sAvxthaRvU ilalx; sAvxthaRvilalxdiruva shudAdhxtamxnige
 punajaRnamxvilalx; avanu modalinaMte shivanoMdige saMpUNaRvAgi
 beretu oMdAgutAtxne.}}
\vskip 4pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad `oMdAguvudu' athavA `sAmarasayx' eMdareVnu \hbox{eMbudu} bahaLa muKayxvAda parxshenx. `gaMDaheMDiralilx sAmarasayx\-vilalx' eMdAga `avaribabxralilxyU bahaLaSuTx viSayagaLalilx BinAnxBi\-pArxyagaLive'
 eMdathaR. oMdu veVLe avaralilx sAmarasayxvidadxre bahaLaSuTx

 mAnavaralilxruva sAmarasayxdaMte alalx. oMdu veVLe shudadhxvAda aMganu
nAnu parashivanAgi\-dedxVne eMba aBipArxyavanunx taLedare, Aga
parashivanU nAnu aMganAgidedxVne eMba aBipArxyavanunx
taLeyabeVkAgutatxde. Adare parashiva saqSiTxsithxtilayagaLanunx
mADidaMte, shudAdhxtamx mADalAra; AdudariMda aMganaSeTxV tAnu
shivanalilx oMdAgi\-dedxVne eMdu tiLiyutAtxneyeV horatu, parashivanu tAnu
aMga\-nalilx oMdAgidedxVneMba BAva taLeyuvudilalx. sAmarasayx\-BAva
beVkAgiruvudu aMganige, liMgakakxlalx.}}
\vskip 4pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad aMganu samarasaBAvavanunx (tAnu parashivanAgidedxVneMba
 BAvavanunx) taLeyutAtxneMbudara athaRveVnu?}}
\vskip 4pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad anuBAvada mUlaka aikayxsithxtiyanunx talupida aMganige tAnu
 parashivanalilx beretiruvudara
 anuBavavAgutatxde. aikayx\-sithxtiyeMdare oMdu niraMtara sithxtiyeV
 horatu, koVpa, duHKa muMtAda sithxtigaLaMtha kaSxNika mAnasika

 tiLiyutAtxne. saMsAra\-badadhxnAdavanu ``nAnu I kelasavanunx
 mADutitxdedxVne'' eMdare, anuBAviyu ``aMga anaMgaveraDU aLidu,
 nijadalilx niMda liMgeYkayxna aMgada meVluLaLx \ kirxVgaLelalxvU

 parashivanige eMdu tiLiyutAtxne. I athaRdalilx avanu parashivana

\vskip 4pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad sAmarasayx paDeda liMgeYkayxnige

 horatu, satatx naMtara alalx; ilelxV paDeyabeVkeV horatu, matotxMdu
 loVkadalilx alalx enunxtAtxre, sharaNaru, veYkuMTha athavA
 keYlAsakekx hoVga\-beVkeMdu Ashisuva Bakatxranunx avaru avaheVLana

\vskip 4pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad sAmarasayx paDedavanige AnaMdavAgutatxde. ililx AnaMda\-veMdare,
 \hbox{namage} gotitxruva lwkika suKa yAvudU alalx. nAvu suKapaDuvudu iMdirxyagaLa
 mUlaka. Adare liMgAMgasAma\-rasayxda AnaMda iMdirxyajanayxvalalx. shudadhxvAda Atamxnu parashiva\-naMte satf, citf,
 AnaMda. yAvudeV duHKakokxLagAgade, yAvudeV riVtiya loVBa, moVha
 muMtAda mAnasika tumulagaLige oLagAgade, shAMtavAgiruvudeV
 AnaMda. parxpaMca\-dalilx Enanunx gaLisabeVkoV adelalx\-kikxMta
 hecicxnadanunx gaLisiruvudeV avana samAdhAna, A samA\-dhAnaveV

 paDedidadxriMda baMdudalalx, elalxvanUnx tayxjisidadx\-riMda
 baMdudu.}}
\vskip 4pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad liMgAMgasAmarasayxvu siDilu hoDedaMte oMdeV sArige

 SaTfsathxlagaLu. ivugaLanunx muKayxvAgi mUru BAga
 mADabahudu. Bakatxsathxla matutx maheVshasathxladalilx liMgapUje,
 maMtarx, neYtika kirxye muMtAda AcAragaLanunx mADi sAdhakanu
 shudadhxnAgalu parxyatinxsutAtxne; parxsAdi matutx pArxNaliMgisathxlagaLalilx elalxvU shivana parxsAdaveMdU, tananxdeVnU
 ilalxveMdU tiLidu sAvxthaRtAyxga mADuvudanUnx, dhAyxna mADuvudanUnx
 kaliyutAtxne. AgAga avanige dhAyxnadalilx shivasAkASxtAkxra
 Agabahudu. sharaNasathxla hAgU aikayxsathxlagaLalilx avanu dhAyxnada
mUlaka shivanalilx oMdAguvudU alalxde tAneMba BAvavanunx
mareyutAtxne.}}
\vskip 4pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad liMgAMgasAmarasayx sAdhayxvAguvudu liMga matutx aMgagaLeraDara

 AgiruvudariMdaleV aMganu liMgadalilx bereyalu \hbox{sAdhayx}. nadiya AkAra,

\src{va}
\meaning{\arthanonum{I padavanunx vacanakAraru aneVka athaRgaLalilx\break baLasidAdxre:}
\artha{basavaNaNxnavara vacana, Adayxra vacana eMbalilx oMdu sheYliya baravaNige eMdAgutatxde. sAmAnayxvAgi gadayxrUpa\-dalilxdadxrU kAvayxda usiru hoMdiruva I parxkAra\-vanenxV nAvu vacana enunxtetxVve. vacana eMba padavu anuBAviya mAtige anavxyisutatxde. satayxvanunx neVravAgi anuBavisida avanige yAvudara nibaRMdhavilalxdudariMda, avanu mAtarx AdhAyxtimxka viSayagaLa bagege adhikArayutavAgi mAtanADabalalx. idaralilx kaSaTxpaTuTx bareyuvaMthadeVnU ilalx. anuBAvigaLige vacanagaLu parxyatanxvilalxdeyeV horabarutatxve.}
\artha{AgamagaLa mAtu:} \ullekha{ahaM savaRjagatf katAR, mamakatAR maheVshavxra eMdu viSuNx heVLida vacanava marediralalx (savasaM. 1; basava. 584-146).}
\artha{shAsatxrXda mAtu, veVdagaLa mAtu:}
\ullekha{shAsatxrXda vacana: hoVtiMge mAri (savasaM. 1; basava. 572-144)}
\artha{diTavAda mAtu:} \ullekha{kUDala saMgana vacana\-viMteMdudu: shavxpa\-coVpiyAdaDeVnu, shivaBakatxneV kulajaM, BoV (savasaM. 1; basava. 589-147)}
\artha{sidAdhxMta:}
\ullekha{anayxra vacanava koMDADalu, kamaR biDadu (savasaM. 1; basava. 107-29).}
\artha{Ajecnx:}
\ullekha{iMteMbudu Adayxra vacana.}
\artha{yAvudeV mAtu:}
\ullekha{avaLa vacana belalxdaMte haqdayadalilx puTidu naMju kaMDayAyx (savasaM. 1; basava. 110-30).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{vajf + (luyxTf) ina- ucayxteV ita - vacanaM}}
\end{entry}

yathA shAsotxrXVkatxvidhinA gaqhiVtAvx goVmayaM navamf |\\[2pt]
sadeyxVna vAmadeVveVna kuyARtipxMDamanutatxmamf ||\\[2pt]
kalapxM tadaBxsamx vijecnxVyaM... |\\[2pt]
haqtapxrXdeVshamaGoVreVNa vAmadeVveVna guhayxkamf |\\[2pt]
BasamxnA vihitaM sAnxnaM... ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(si. shi., 7. 14, 22-23)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\ullekha{paMcabarxhamx maMtarxve shivana deVhaveMda\char'273\char'311vudayAyx. shirave \hbox{IshAnayx} muKave tatupxruSa, haqdayave aGoVra, guhayxve vAmadeVva, pAdave sadoyxVjAtamaMtarxvayAyx, iMtiV paMcamaMtarxtanu\-rUpAdada niVne kUDalacenanxsaMgamadeVvA (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1324-469); sadoyxVjAta vAmadeVva aGoVra tatupxruSa IshAnaveMba paMcabarxhamxmaMtarxMgaLu ...lwkikadeVshaBASAmaMtarxM\-gaLaM beV\char'273\char'311\ beV\char'273\char'311\ viveVkisi noVDi (viveVka. 75); OM hirxVM mAM vAmadeVvAya namaH, idu guhayxkekx saMbaMdhavAgutatxde. OM harxH OM haqdayAya namaH, idu savARMgadalilx saMbaMdhavAgutatxde. I maMtarxgaLige anu\-karxma\-vAgi sadoyxVjAtamaMtarx, vAmadeVvamaMtarx, aGoVramaMtarx, tatupxruSamaMtarx IshAnamaMtarx haqdayamaMtarx eMba hesaru\-gaLive. BasomxVdUdhxLanakAladalilx I maMtarxgaLanunx nishicxta\-saMKeyxyiMda ucacxrisutatx AyA sAthxnagaLalilx Basitavanunx hacicxkoLaLxtakakxdudx (shivAkoV. 115-257).}}
%\ullekha{sadoyxVjAta badadhxjAcnxni, vAmadeVva AturajAcnxni... (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 1570-466); gudasAthxnadalilx AdhAracakarx... adu deVvarigU tamagU utatxramuKa vAmadeVvavakatxrX... (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1149-392); elalxru liMgava pUjisi... savaRdeVvatAshikaSxtavx paDeda noVDA, vAmadeVvanu... (savasaM. 4; sidadhxrA. 1825-520); sadugxru sAvxmi shiSayxMge... sadoyxVjAta vAmadeVva aGoVra tatupxruSa IshAnaveMba... (savasaM. 5; akakxma. 393-119); paqthivx apupx teVja... sadoyxVjAtaM tathA BakatxM vAmadeVvaM maheVshavxraM... (savasaM. 6; Adayayx. 1019-309); atuyxrutarada jihevx guhayxM rasamumAnaMdavArigaM vAmadeVva varamUtiRyadhideYvaM (cebapu. 61-44); parashivanige sadoyxVjAta, vAmadeVva, aGoVra, tatupxruSa, IshAna eMdu paMcamuKagaLiveyaSeTx. ...jagatitxna utapxtitxya kAladalilx Aguva Aru vidhagaLu athavA sAdAKayxgaLu I muKagaLalilxyeV uMTAguvuvu (shivAkoV. 157-257); sadoyxVjAta vAmadeVva aGoVra tatupxruSa IshAnaveMba paMcabarxhamxmaMtarxMgaLaM ...lwkikadeVshaBASA maMtarxMgaLaM beV{\ro} beV{\ro} viveVkisi noVDi (viveVka. 75).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{vAmayati duSATxnAM madaM iti - vAmaH, vAmashacx asw deVvashacx - vAmadeVvaH}}

\begin{entry}
\word{vAmasheYva}\label{vAmasheYva}
\src{saM}
\meaning{\arthanonum{vAma, dakiSxNa, misharx, sidAdhxMta eMba nAlukx vidhada sheYva taMtarxgaLalilx oMdu. shakitxyeV savaRsherxVSaThxLu eMdu nirUpisuva taMtarx\-sAhitayx:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
teVSu sheYvaM catuBeRVdaM taMtarxM savaRvinishicxtamf |\\[2pt]
vAmaM ca dakiSxNaM ceYva misharxM sidAdhxMtasaMjacnxkamf ||\\[2pt]
shakitxparxdhAnaM vAmAKayxM dakiSxNaM BeYravAtamxkamf |\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(si. shi., 5. 10-11)}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
shakitxH savoRVtatxmA yatarx tadAvxmamiti kathayxteV |\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(viV. sa. saM., 8. 12)}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{vAmashacx asw sheYvaH - vAmasheYvaH}}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\SEE{taMtarx}}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{vAyavayxsAnxna}\label{vAyavayxsAnxna}
\meaning{\artha{hasugaLa dhULiniMda mADuva sAnxna:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
gaMgoVdakAdivAyavayx sAnxneVSu... | 
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(si. shi., tatatxvX. parx., 7. 26)}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
... vAyavayxM rajasA gavAmf || 
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(shi. ta. ra., 8. 5. 63)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{divayx, vAruNa, vAyavayx, mAnasa matutx AgenxVya eMba paMcavidhasAnxnagaLalilx oMdu; goVvugaLa pAdadhULiyanunx meYge hacicxkoLuLxvudu:}
\ullekha{divayxsAnxna vAruNasAnxna vAyavayxsAnxna mAnasasAnxna AgenxVyasAnxnaveMba paMcavidha sAnxnaMgaLoLage AgenxVyameMba BasamxsAnxnaveV sakala sAnxnaMgaLoLage koVTi\-koVTi\-guNAdhikaM (viveVka. 127); goVvugaLa pAdadhULiya sapxshaRveV vAyuvayxsAnxnavu (aSATxvi. 4-64).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{vAyoVH idaM - vAyavayxM; vAyavayxM ca tatf sAnxnaM ca - vAyavayxsAnxnaM}}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\SEE{sAnxna}}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{vAyu}\label{vAyu}
%\src{saM}
\meaning{\artha{paMcaBUtagaLalilx oMdu. mUvatAtxru tatatxvX\-gaLalilx oMdu. kaMpana, BarxmaNa, shoVSaNa (oNagisuvudu), veVga\-vAgi calisuva matutx sapxshaRguNagaLiMda kUDiruva mahA\-BUta. idu AkAshadiMda huTiTx, aginxyanunx huTiTxsu\-vaMtahadudx:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
tasAmxdAvx EtasAmxdAtamxna AkAshaH saMBUtaH |\\[2pt]
AkAshAdAvxyuH | vAyoVraginxH |\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(teY. u., 2.1)}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
kaMpaBarxmaNashoVSaNaveVgavAnf sapxsheYRkaguNoV vAyuH |\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(shi. maM., pu. 54)}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
OM hArxM vAyutatatxvXmAvAhayAmiVtAyxdinA |\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(liM. dhA. caM., pu. 275)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\ullekha{paqthivx apupx teVja vAyu AkAsha niraMjanadeVvA nimamx mahimeya parxNavasavxrUpaMgalalxde kANalaArigeyU bAradayAyx (savasaM. 1; basava. 814-209); sadoyxVjAtamuKadalilx paqthivx puTiTxtutx ...tatupxruSamuKadalilx vAyu puTiTxtutx IshAnamuKadalilx AkAsha puTiTxtutx iMtiV paMcabarxhamxdiMda paMcamahABUtaMgaLu puTiTxduvu (karaNa. 658-6).}
\artha{parashivana aSaTxtanugaLAda paqthivx, apupx, aginx, vAyu, AkAsha, caMdarx, sUyaR matutx jiVvAtamx eMba eMTu aMshagaLalilx oMdu:}
\ullekha{aSaTxtanumUtiR liMgaveMdeMbaru keVLirayAyx, Adiya maga atiVta atiVtana maga AkAsha, AkAshana maga vAyu, vAyuvina maga aginx, ...deVhada maganAtamx, iMtiV aSaTxtanuvelalxkekxyu utapxtayxvuMTu (savasaM. 1; basava. 957-252).}}
%\ullekha{ninAnxLi kuMbArana... vAyuvina sheYtayxdalilx Arisi... (savasaM. 1; basava. 1250-344); mana muTaTxda... vAyu tAgada naliMgadaMgava toVrA guheVshavxrA... (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 419-119); paqthAvxyXdi paMcaBUtaMgu... I aidu vAyuvina aMsha... (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1351-477); sUyaRparxkAsha AkAshada... vAyuvina calaneyelAlx hagalina pUje... (savasaM. 5; akakxma. 402-121); paratatatxvXda paqthivxyeMdu... paratatatxvXda teVjaveMdu, paratatatxvXda vAyuveMdu... (savasaM. 13; bAlasaM. 645-290).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{vAta iti - vAyuH}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{vAyujapaMcaka}\label{vAyujapaMcaka}
\src{saM}
\meaning{\arthanonum{ipapxtetxYdu tatatxvXgaLalolxMdAda vAyuviniMda janisida aidu tatatxvXgaLu.}}
\vskip 3pt
\newmeaning{\artha{vAyuvinoMdige beVre beVre tatatxvXgaLa seVpaRDe\-yiMda uMTA\-guva vAyxna, samAna, udAna, apAna, pArxNa eMba\break aidu tatatxvXgaLu. vAyuvina aMshadiMda vAyxna, \hbox{AkAshada} aMshadiMda samAna, teVjasisxna aMshadiMda udAna, jalAMshadiMda apAna, BUmayxMshadiMda pArxNa huTuTxtatxve:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
vAyw vAvavxMshatoV vAyxnoV vAyw voyxVmanxH samAnakaH |\\[2pt]
vAyavAyxdudAnasetxVjoVM\char'263shAdapAnoV vAyavxMshataH ||\\[2pt]
vAyw BUmayxMshataH pArxNa iti vAyujapaMcakamf |\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(shi. ta. ra., 1. 7. 50-51)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{itara tatatxvXgaLoMdige vAyuvina seVpaRDeyiMda uMTA\-guva manasusx, samAna, shorxVterxVMdirxya, shabadx, vAkf eMba aidu tatatxvXgaLu:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
vAyoVmaRnasasxmAnw ca shorxVtarxM shabadxshacx vAgapi ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(shi. ta. ra., 1. 7. 56)}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
mana Eva viyadfvAyxnoV vAyushacxmaRdhanaMjayaH |\\[2pt]
sapxshoRV{\char'263}MBashacx kaSxmA pANimaRrutasatxtatxvXpaMcakamf ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(shi. yoV. parx., 4. 21)}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{vAyunA jAyateV iti - vAyujaM; vAyujaM ca tatf paMcakaM ca vAyujapaMcakaM}}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\SEE{paMciVkaraNa}}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{vAyudhAraNe}\label{vAyudhAraNe}
\meaning{\arthanonum{hadinAlukx vidhada vAyugaLalilx aidu muKayxvAduvu. A aidaralilx oMdeV
vAyu muKayx. adu \hbox{deVhada} elalx kaDegaLalUlx calisutitxdudx,
pArxNA\-yAmada mUlaka (pUraka, reVcaka, kuMBakagaLa mUlaka)
adanunx barxhamxnADiyalilx nililxsuvudeV vAyudhAraNe. idu AyuSayxvaqdidhx
mADuvudalalxde, namamx jAcnxnashakitxyanunx \hbox{hecicxsi},\break parashivanoMdige
beLe\-yalu sahAyakavAguvudu:}
\ullekha{inunx vAyudhAraNe eMteMdaDe: catudaRshavAyugaLoLu paMca\-vAyuve muKayxvAgihudu (savasaM. 13; bAlasaM. 279-\-120); vAyudhAraNe mahAvAyuvanu piDidu samacitatx\-nAgi mUlajAvxleyanebibxsuvudu (\hbox{shivAkoV.} 149-379).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{vAyoVH dhAraNaM - vAyudhAraNaM}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{vAyupaMcaka}\label{vAyupaMcaka}
\meaning{\artha{karaNahasigeya paMciVkaqtigaLalilx oMdu paMcaka; vAyuvina paMciVkaraNadiMda deVhatatatxvXdalilx parxkaTa\-goMDa pArxNa, apAna, udAna, samAna, vAyxnaveMba aidu vAyugaLa guMpu:}
\ullekha{pariva, pAruva, suLiva, niluva, agaluva - I aidu vAyupaMcaka (savasaM. 4; \hbox{sidadhxrA.} 1005-282); hiMgeV vAyupaMcaka\-dalilxyU liMgaveV sAvxyatavAgipupxdayayx (savasaM. 11; toVMTasi. 335-157); vAyupaMcakaMgaLa tiruLanuruhi tananxnariyabalAlxtaneV sharaNa (savasaM. 12; deVshikeVM. 695-209).}
\artha{shariVradalilx parxdhAna\-vAgiruva pArxNa, apAna, vAyxna, udAna matutx samAna eMba paMcavAyugaLu:}
\ullekha{BUtapaMcaka vAyupaMcaka iMdirxya\-dashaka karaNacatuSaTxyaMgaLenipa catuviRMshati\-tatatxvX haMtahadiVga deVha (karaNa. 664-7); samAnoVdAnavA vAyxnamaMtapAnaM\break pArxNavu I vAyupaMcakamuM ...niVna{\ri}vudeY paMcashakitx\-savxrUpaveY (viVsheYpu. 14-7-100).} \artha{pArxNa, apAna, vAyxna, udAna, samAna eMdu parxdhAnavAgi aidu BeVda. raMBa eMbudu Araneyadu. ivu karxmavAgi AcAraliMga, guruliMga, shivaliMga, caraliMga, parxsAdaliMga, mahAliMgada rUpa\-gaLu. nAga, kUmaR, kaqkara, deVva\-datatx, dhanaMjaya, satxMBa eMdu Aru upavAyu\-gaLu. I upavAyu\-gaLu karxmavAgi Bakatx, mAheVshavxra, parxsAdi, pArxNaliMgi, sharaNa, aikayx eMba SaTfsathxlarUpa\-gaLu:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
vAyavaH-pArxNaH apAnaH vAyxnaH udAnaH samAnaH raMBaH iti nAmAnx vataRmAnAH AcAraliMga guruliMga shivaliMga jaMgamaliMga parxsAdaliMga mahAliMgarUpAH |...\\
upavAyavaH-nAgaH kUmaRH kaqkaraH deVvadatatxH dhanaMjayaH satxMBaH iti nAmAnx vataRmAnAH BakatxmAheVshavxraparxsAdi pArxNaliMgi sharaNeYkayxrUpAH... |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(shurx. sA., 16, pu. 8)}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{vAyUnAM paMcakaM - vAyupaMcakaM}}
\end{entry}

(savasaM. 12; deVshikeVM. 736-223); AkAshadoLagaNa aginx ahaMkAra AkAshadoLagaNa apapx, budidhx, AkAshadoLagaNa paqthivx citatx, iMtivu AkAshada paMciVkaqtiyayAyx (SaTajAcnx. 74-28).}}

\begin{entry}
\word{vAyupaMcatatxvX}\label{vAyupaMcatatxvX}
\src{kA}
\meaning{\arthanonum{paMciVkaraNadiMdAgi vAyuvinalilx parxkaTagoLuLxva aidu tatatxvXgaLu:}
\ullekha{vAyxpisuva manavudAnAnilaM tavxkasxpXshaRnoVpAya pANiVMdirxyaMgaLeYduM vAyupaMcatatatxvXM (viVsheYpu. 7-100-13).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{vAyUnAM paMcAnAM tatatxvXM - vAyupaMcatatatxvXM}}
\vskip 4pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\SEE{vAyupaMcaka}}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{vAyupArxNi}\label{vAyupArxNi}
\src{va}
\meaning{\artha{paMcapArxNavAyugaLiMda kUDida shariVravuLaLxvanu; liMgasaMbaMdhavilalxdavanu:}
\ullekha{pUvaRbiVja vAyu\-pArxNiyalalx, liMgapArxNiyA sharaNanu (savasaM. 1; basava. 766-191); vAyupArxNiya kaLedu liMgapArxNiya mADida baLika, elilxya kulasUtaka, elilxya CalasUtaka? (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 1549-460); I vAyupArxNiya kaLedu, liMga\-pArxNiya mADabalalxre kUDalacenanxsaMgayayxnalilx adeV yoVga (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 327-105); tananx hasatxva masatxka\-dalilxTuTx vAyupArxNiyAgiduRda koMdu liMgapArxNiya mADida baLika, akaSxraveYdaralilx mukatxna mADida baLika, maraLi yoVgavuMTe shivayoVgavalalxde? (savasaM. 4; sidadhxrA. 1290-372); vAyakekx parabarxhamxva nuDiva vAyupArxNigaLavaretatx balalxroV, A parabarxhamxna nijada nilava? (savasaM. 5; akakxma. 58-21).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{vAyuH Eva pArxNaH asitx asimxnf iti - vAyupArxNiV}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{vAyuliMga}\label{vAyuliMga}
\src{kA}
\meaning{\arthanonum{paMcaBUtagaLa savxrUpadalilxruva \hbox{parashivana} paMcaliMgarUpagaLalilx oMdu; kALahasitxyalilxruva vAyu\-savxrUpa liMga:}
\ullekha{kAMciVpuradalilx pAthiRvaliMga ...kALahasitxyalilx vAyuliMga, cidaMbaradalilx AkAshaliMga - hiVge vishavxdalilx kANuva paMcaBUtagaLa rUpadalilxyU paramAtamxnu sAdAKayxgaLenisi virAji\-sutitxruvudanunx nAvu sapxSaTxvAgi kANutetxVve (shakitxvi. 26).}}

\begin{entry}

\src{kA}
\meaning{\arthanonum{karaNahasigeya paMciVkaraNagaLalilx oMdu; deVhatatatxvXdalilx apupxvina paMciVkaraNadiMdAda aidara oMdu guMpu:}

\begin{entry}
\word{vAruNasAnxna}\label{vAruNasAnxna}
\meaning{\arthanonum{divayx, vAruNa, vAyavayx, mAnasa matutx AgenxVya eMba paMcavidha sAnxnagaLalilx oMdu; niVriniMda mADuva sAnxna:}}
\medskip

\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad vacanakArara parashivanu niguRNanalalx. avanige aneVka guNagaLive. avelalxvanUnx `shakitx' eMba padadaDiyalilx tarabahudu. `shakitx' eMba padakekx eraDu viBinanx athaRgaLive. udAharaNege `kuMbAranige maDake mADuva shakitxyide'

 itAyxdigaLAgi mApaRDutatxde. iveV tatatxvXgaLu himumxKa\-vAgi calisi mUla

 avasethxge vikAsavAguvAgalAgali, saqSiTxyiMda parxlayasithxtige

\begin{entry}
\word{sharaNa}\label{sharaNa}
\meaning{\artha{sharaNasathxlada viVrasheYva sAdhaka. shivana viSayadalilx savARpaRNaBAvadiMda kUDida, Bakitx-jAcnxna-veYrAgayx saMpananxnAda, niraMtaravAgi shivAnaMdadalilx maganxnAgiruva sAdhaka. tananxnunx satiyeMdU, shivananunx patiyeMdU BAvaneyuLaLxvanu:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}

yatf swKayxM tatasxmAveVsheV tadAvxnf sharaNanAmavAnf ||\\[2pt]
satiVva ramaNeV yasutx shiveV shakitxM viBAvayanf |\\[2pt]
tadanayxvimuKaH soV{\char'263}yaM jAcnxtaH sharaNanAmavAnf ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(si. shi., 13. 2, 5)}
\medskip
\begin{shl}

\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(kirx. sA., BA-3, pu. 122)}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
aMgatavxmeVva galitaM shivateYva sidAdhx\\[2pt]
tasAmxdataHparxBaqti meV suKameVva BUyAtf |\\[2pt]
itathxM niraMtarasuKAmaqtavAdhiRpUra\\[2pt]
maganxH sa Eva sharaNAKayx iha parxsidadhxH ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(viV. dha. shi., 4. 91)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{SaTasxthXlagaLalilx oMdu; aidaneya sathxla:} 
\ullekha{Bakatx maheVsha parxsAdi pArxNaliMgi sharaNa aikayx eMdiMtu SaTasxthXlavA\char'273\char'304\ ...sharaNa aikayx I eraDu jaMgamasathxla (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1412-504); tatApxrXNa\-liMgi sharaNanumeYkayx tatatxrXyAMga\-sathxlavadu sogasutiha jaMgama\-doLaM tiLidu (viVsheYpu. 8-133-13); Bakatx \hbox{mAheVshavxra} parxsAdigaLeMdu Gana pArxNaliMgi sharaNanumeYkayxnA\char'273\char'304\char'311Mdu I pariyalihudu Bakatxnu aMga \hbox{SaTasxthXlaM} (diVkASxboV. 117-24).}
\artha{shivananunx BakitxyiMda\break ArAdhisuvavanu; shivaBakatx:} 
\ullekha{\hbox{sharaNa} niderxgeYdaDe japa kANiro sharaNa\-nedudx kuLitaDe shivarAtirx kANiro ...kUDalasaMgana sharaNana kAyave keYlAsa kANiro (savasaM. 1; basava. 873-229); sharaNa kaNaNxpadeVvana shirxVcaraNa\-rakeSxya mahimeyaM visatxrisalaridaridaridu sAviraheDegaLahipatige (\hbox{basapu.} 17-95).}
\artha{\hbox{mahAliMga}:}
\ullekha{bayalu mUtiRyAgi niMdanobabx sharaNa (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 3-4).}}

upayaRdhoVBAganiSAThxshacxtAvxroV{\char'263}pi surAciRta ||

\begin{shl}

\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(caM. A., kirx. pA., 3. 10-12)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{SaTasxthXlagaLige anukarxmavAgiruva AcAraliMga, guruliMga, shivaliMga, jaMgamaliMga, parxsAdaliMga matutx mahAliMga eMba SaDivxdha liMgagaLalilx oMdu; parxsAdisathxlakekx saMbaMdhisida liMga; idaralilx anugarxhaliMga, apiRtaliMga, tanuguNa\-liMgagaLeMba mUru parxmuKa parxkAragaLive. ivugaLalilx karxmavAgi kAyAnugarxha, iMdirxyAnugarxha, pArxNAnugarxha, kAyApiRta, karaNApiRta, BAvApiRta, shiSayx, shushUrxSe matutx seVvayxgaLeMba oMbatutx viBAgagaLive. liMganiSaThxnAdavanu tananx deVhadalilx parxvahisuva shakitxgaLanunx SaTacxkarxgaLa mUlaka liMgamuKavanAnxgi mADidAga shivaliMgavu maNipUraka cakarxdalilx nelegoLuLxtatxde. manuSayxnalilx citatx, budidhx, ahaMkAra, manasusx, jAcnxna matutx BAvagaLa mUlaka kirxyegaLu naDeyutatxve. ivugaLalilx ahaMkAravu shivaliMgakekx saMbaMdhiside:}
\ullekha{AcAraliMga\-viDidu guru\-liMgava kANabeVku, guruliMgaviDidu shivaliMgava kANabeVku, shivaliMgaviDidu jaMgamaliMgava kANabeVku (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 867-254); AcAraliMga guruliMga shivaliMga jaMgamaliMga parxsAdaliMga mahAliMga I Aru liMgasathxlagaLu ...avaravara saMbaMdha\-vAvAveMdare GArxNadalilx AcAraliMga\-saMbaMdha jihevxyalilx guruliMgasaMbaMdha neVtarxdalilx shivaliMgasaMbaMdha (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 966-308).}
\artha{deVva\-sAthxna muMtAda kaDegaLalilx pUjegAgi parxtiSeThxgoMDiruva Ishavxrana mUtiR; sAthxvaraliMga:}
\ullekha{saMtasaM mige shaMBuvina niLayakeyatxMdu oLahokukx shivaliMgadarushanamumaM mADi (nUpura. 7-7); shivaBakatxru shivaliMgapUje dAsoVha mADidaralalxlilx (kaDasavx. 2-27-1).}}

(savasaM. 4; sidadhxrA. 600-172); kAraNanapapx patiparashivaliMgaveV nitayxveMbarivanuMTumADuva alupatx shakitxyanu sharaNasathxladalilx paDevudu noVDA. (savasaM. 5; akakxma. 209-61);

\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad niVlakaMTha shivAcAyaRru viVrasheYva sidAdhxMtavanunx `shivAdevxYta' eMdu parxtipAdisidAdxre. idakekx shakitxvishiSATxdevxYta, visheVSAdevxYta, SaTfsathxla-liMgAMga sAmarasayx, shivayoVga, mahApAshupata eMba hesarugaLU ive. shivAgamagaLalilx\break I elalx hesarugaLiMda kUDiruva I sidAdhxMtavanunx \hbox{`viVrasheYva'}\break hesariniMda kareyutAtxre. `viV' eMba akaSxravu shiva-\-jiVvara aikayxboVdhakavAda videyxyanunx boVdhisutatxde. aMtaha videyxyalilx `ra' ramisatakakx (AnaMdisatakakx) sheYvareV\break \hbox{`viVrasheYva'}renisutAtxre. shivAdevxYta eMdare shivanalilx oMdAgu\-vike. parashivaceYtanayxvu tananx icACxshakitxya vashadiMda malatarxyagaLa saMbaMdhadiMda shariVratarxya\-gaLanunx (sUthxla-sUkaSxmX-kAraNa) hoMdi, kaTiTxgeya beMkiyu aneVka kiDigaLAgi AviBaRvisuvaMte anaMta jiVvarugaLa BAravanunx hoMdu\-tatxde. tananx neYja savxrUpavanunx\break maremAcikoMDiruva parashivaceYtanayxvu tananxlilxya shakitx\-vikAsadiMdAgi malatarxyagaLanunx dUramADi\-koLuLxva kAraNa shariVratarxyada saMbaMdha\-vanunx kaLedukoMDu, nadigaLu samudarxdalilx liVnavAguvAga tamamx tamamx hesaru, rUpagaLanunx kaLedukoLuLxva hAge, tananx mUlasavxrUpavAda AnaMdarasadalilx liVnavAgi tAneV tAnAgi Agutatxde. jiVvaru shivanalilx seVruva I parxkirxyeyeV `shivAdevxYta':}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
viVshabedxVnoVcayxteV vidAyx shivajiVveYkayxboVdhiniV |\\[2pt]
tasAyxM ramaMteV yeV sheYvAH viVrasheYvAH parxkiVtiRtAH |\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(si.shi. 5.16)}

\begin{shl}

\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad viVrasheYvadalilx padeV padeV baruva `shivAdevxYta' eMba padakekx devxYtAdevxYta athavA shakitxvishiSATxdevxYta eMba athaRvanunx koDabahudu. shivAdevxYta eMdare iruvavanu shivanobabxneV eMba sidAdhxMta. hAgAdare, aneVka BwtavasutxgaLiMda kUDida jagatUtx aneVka jiVvigaLU iveyalalx eMba saMdeVha barutatxde. adevxYta sidAdhxMtada parxkAra barxhamxnobabxneV satayx, AtamxgaLa aneVkateyU BwtaparxpaMcavU asatayx. Adare viVrasheYvada shivAdevxYta eMdare, AtamxgaLU jagatUtx asatayx alalx, avu shiva\-noLageV aDagirutatxve. jiVva jagatutx matutx Ishavxrara naDuvaNa saMbaMdhavanunx viVrasheYvadalilx samudarx matutx noreteregaLa saMbaMdhakekx hoVlisalAgide. samudarxvilalxdidadxre, teregaLU noreyU iralu sAdhayxvilalx. samudarxveV avugaLa asitxtavxkekx kAraNa. hAgeyeV parashivaneV ilalxdidadxre, jagatutx jiVvagaLu irutitxralilalx. EkeMdare, avugaLu avaniMda vayxkatxvAgutatxve. eraDaneyadAgi, teregaLU noreyU samudarxda oMdu avasethx. avugaLa rUpa AkAra badalAgabahudu. Adare avugaLa AdhAra badalAguvudilalx. hAgeyeV jiVva jagatutx parashivana vividha avasethxgaLu, avugaLa nAmarUpagaLu badalAgabahudAdarU, avugaLa AdhAra mAtarx parashivaneV.\break athavA Bititx oMdaralilx beVre beVre kAlagaLalilx beVre beVre citarxgaLanunx heVge racisabahudoV, hAgeyeV parashivaneMba \hbox{AdhArada} meVle beVre beVre kAlagaLalilx beVre beVre jagatutxgaLu beVre beVre jiVvarAshigaLU kANisikoLaLxbahudu.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad noreyu, taraMgagaLu samudarxdiMda BinanxvAgirade, adara aMgagaLAgiruva hAgeyeV, jiVva jagatutx parashivaniMda BinanxvAgirade avana aMga(BAga)vAgive. AdudariMda nijavAgi, shivanobabxneV iruvavanu. I sidAdhxMtaveV shivAdevxYta:}

\meaning{\artha{elalx jiVvigaLalilx tanu, karaNa, Buvana, BoVgAdigaLa rUpadalilx parxkAshisi, konege cililxMgadalilx laya\-vAguva mAye:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}

liVyateV tatarx cililxMgeV shiSaTxM tatapxrikiVtiRtamf ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(si. shi., 20. 14)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{shivApiRtagaLAda BakaSxyX, BoVjayx, peVyAdigaLanunx parxsAdavAgi sivxVkarisuva parxsAdi:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}

GArxtameVva hi jiGarxMti piVtameVva pibaMti ca ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(sakx. pu., ulelxVKa: keY. sA., vi. saM., 220)}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
shiveVna BukatxM BuMjiVyAtf tatipxVtaM hi jalaM pibeVtf |\\[2pt]
shivAGArxtaM sadA jiGerxVdeVSa dhamaRH sanAtanaH ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(caM. A., kirx. pA., 5. 22)}
\vskip 5pt
%\newmeaning{\ullekha{huTiTxsuvAta barxhamxneMbaru... duSaTxnigarxha shiSaTxparxtipAlaka namamx kUDalasaMgamadeVva... (savasaM. 1; basava. 547-136); duSaTxnigarxha shiSaTxparipAlakanapapx divayxvasutx... (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 1264-372); gurujaMgamada pAdatiVthaRvu... saMsAkxra vishiSaTxvAda limgakekxyA, jaMgamakekxyA... (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1157-398); tanuveMba heVLigege... EkoV rudarx shiSaTx kapilasidadhxmalilxkAjuRna. (savasaM. 4; sidadhxrA. 600-172); kAyada haMga haridu... vishiSaTxdanujecnxyAyitatxyAyx. saMgayayxnalilx basavanaDagalu rinanx... (savasaM. 5; niVlamamx. 943-289).}}
\newmeaning{\ni{shiSaTx - shiSaTxH - shAsf + katx athavA - shiSf + katx - shiSayxteV iti shiSaTxH, - shiSATx (sitxrXV)}}

\begin{entry}
\word{shiSayx}\label{shiSayx}
\meaning{\artha{shirxVguruviniMda diVkeSxyanunx paDedu viVrasheYva shAsatxrXgaLanunx adhayxyana mADi adaraMte naDeyuvavanu. deYhikavAgi - mAnasikavAgi shudadhxnU, shiVla\-saMpananxnU, dhamiRSaThxnU, satayx\-vAdiyU, jiteVMdirxyanU, nirahaMkAriyU, rAgadevxVSa\-gaLilalxdavanU, guruvinalilx BakitxyuLaLxvanU, guruvinAjecnx\-yanunx pAlisatakakxvanU, viSayAsakitx\-rahitanU, Adavanu:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
atha shiSayxsavxrUpaM ca vakeSxyXV saMkeSxVpataH shaqNu |\\[2pt]
shuciH sushiVloV dhamiRSaThxH satayxvAgivxjiteVMdirxyaH ||\\[2pt]
ahaMkAravinimuRkotxV rAgadevxVSAdivajiRtaH ||\\[2pt]
guruBakotxV jitakorxVdhoV guvARjAcnxparipAlakaH |\\[2pt]
viSayAsaMganimuRkotxV vinijiRtamadASaTxkaH ||\\[2pt]
EvaM guNAnivxtaM shiSayxM pariVkaSxyX gururAdarAtf |\\[2pt]
shikaSxyeVtatxsayx veY citatxM yathA Bavati nimaRlamf ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(sU. A., kirx. pA., 5. 31-33)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\ullekha{shiSayxna pUvARsharxyavu guruviniMdaDagitutx (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1604-585); guruvanariyabalalx shiSayx shiSayxnanariyabalalx guru ivaribabxra BeVdava niVne balelx (savasaM. 7; gajeVsha. 20-75).}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{parakAyada (parabarxhamxdeVhiyAda) shivayoVgiyiMda AdeVshitanAda, shivayoVgiya parxsAdadiMdaleV moVkASx\-peVkiSxyAda Bakatx:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
shAsaniVyoV BaveVdayxsutx parakAyeVna savaRdA |\\[2pt]
tatapxrXsAdAtutx moVkASxthiRV sa shiSayx iti kiVtiRtaH ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(si. shi., 17. 58)}
\medskip
\newmeaning{\artha{jAcnxnaveYrAgAyxdi guNagaLiMda sherxVSaThxnAda tananx guruvinalilx manasusx, vAkukx matutx kamaRgaLeMba tirxkaraNagaLiMda kUDida BAvavu nitayxvU, sidadhxvU AgiruvaMtaha Bakatx:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
BAvoV yasayx sithxroV nitayxM manoVvAkAkxyakamaRBiH |\\[2pt]
gurw nijeV guNoVdAreV sa shiSayx iti giVyateV ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(si. shi., 17. 59)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{guruvu mADida kamaRvanunx, tirxkaraNa pUvaRkavAgi taninxMda mADalu sAdhayxvAgirali athavA sAdhayxvAgadirali, aMtaha kAyaRvanunx pArxNApaRNe athavA dhanavayxyadiMda\-lAdarU avashayxvAgi mADuvavanu:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
shurxtaM karoVti shushUrxSA kAyeVna manasA girA |\\[2pt]
ukatxM yadugxruNA pUvaRM shakayxM vAshakayxmeVva vA ||\\[2pt]
karoVteyxVva hi pUtAtAmx pArxNeYrapi dhaneYrapi |\\[2pt]
tasAmxdevxY shAsituM yoVgayxH shiSayxH itayxBidhiVyateV ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(kirx. sA., BA-3, 17. 141-144)}
\smallskip
%\newmeaning{\artha{shiSayxsathxLa.}}
%\smallskip
%\begin{shl}
%guru niVlakaMThadeVvara shiSayx guMDanA|garada basavaliMgeVshavxranu\\[1pt]
%parashiva basaveVshavxrana kAvayxvanu vi|satxrisenalopepx haruSade.
%\end{shl}
%\smallskip
%newmeaning{\ullekha{pAdavilalxda guruviMge taleyilalxda shiSayxnu... (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 630-170); kUDalacenanxsaMgayayxnavara gurushiSayxtanava. (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1243-434); osarutiha liMgavanu vashake taMdu shiSayxMge... (savasaM. 4; sidadhxrA. 359-103); tananx shiSayx tananx maganeMbudu tapapxdalA... (savasaM. 5; akakxma. 233-70); guru-liMga-jaMgamaveMdariyada... shiSayxna mADikoMbuva heDaDxjaDajiVvigaLaneVneMbenayayx!... (savasaM. 6; aMbiga. 136-46); tanuguNaliMgatirxvidha -ivu shiSayx, shushUrxSA, seVvayx eMdu ive. guruvinalilx shiSayxtavxvanunx aMgiVkarisuvudu shiSayxvu (shivAkoV. 89-105).}}
\newmeaning{\artha{{\large shiSayxparxBeVda:} vaMshayxshiSayx, AgaMtukashiSayx eMdu eraDu vidha. vaMshayx\-shiSayxnu matetx muKayx matutx sAmAnayx eMdu eraDu vidha. muKayx shiSayxnu barxhamxcAri, gaqhasathx eMdu eraDu vidha.\break barxhamxcAriyu paTATxdhikAri carapati, nirABAri eMdu mUru vidha. beVre vaMshadalilx janisida shiSayxnu AgaMtukashiSayx eMdenisutAtxne:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
vaMshayx AgaMtukashecxVti divxvidhaH shiSayx ucayxteV |\\[2pt]
muKayxH sAmAnayxH iteyxVvaM punavaRMshoyxV divxdhA mataH ||\\[2pt]
barxhamxcAriV gaqhiV ceVti divxdhA muKoyxV viBidayxteV |\\[2pt]
ukatxlakaSxNasaMpanonxV barxhamxcAriV punasitxrXdhA ||\\[2pt]
paTATxBiSeVkavAnAdayxH yaH porxVkatxshacxrapatisatxthA |\\[2pt]
nirABArasatxqqtiVyaH sAyxtf savaRloVkeVSu vishurxtaH ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(viV. sa. saM., 14. 2-4)}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{shAsituM yoVgayxH - shiSayxH}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{shiSayxvagaRmaTha}\label{shiSayxvagaRmaTha}
\src{saM}
\meaning{\arthanonum{viVra, naMdi, BaqMgi, vaqSaBa, sakxMda eMba aidu jana goVtArxdhikArigaLAda mAheVshavxrara (jaMgama) saMtatiya eraDu vidhada maThagaLalilx oMdu (matotxMdu putarxvagaRmaTha). putarxvagaRmaThasathxralilx saMtati ilalxdidadxre A maThada goVtarx sUtArxnuyAyigaLAda beVre vaMshada jaMgama vaTugaLanunx utatxrAdhikArigaLanAnxgi mADuva maTha, shiSayxvagaRmaTha:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}

shiSayxvagaRmaTheV tatarx carapaTATxBiSeVcaneV ||\\[2pt]
tatatxcACxKAsu jAtaMnAM yatarx kutArxpi vatiRnAmf |\\[2pt]
viVramAheVshavxrANAM hi savxsavxgoVtArxnusArataH ||\\[2pt]
diVkASxM kaqtAvx paTaTxbadAdhxnf kuvaRMti carasaMjacnxkAnf |\\[2pt]
yeVSevxVvaM hi maThAsetxV shiSayxvagiRNAmf ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(viV. sa. saM., 14. 7-9)}

\newmeaning{\ni{shiSayxvagaRsayx maThaH - shiSayxvagaRmaThaH}}

\begin{entry}
\word{shiSayxsathxla}\label{shiSayxsathxla}
\meaning{\arthanonum{liMgaSaTAkxMtagaRta parxsAdisathxlada (shivaliMgasathxlada) oMbatutx vidhada avAMtarasathxlagaLalilx oMdu. parakAyanAda (parabarxhamxdeVhi) yoVgi\-yiMda apapxNe mADidavanu matutx Atana parxsAdadiMda moVkASxkAMkiSxyAdavanu shiSayx eMdeni\-sutAtxne. yAvana Bakitxyu jAcnxnaveYrAgAyxdi guNa\-gaLiMda sithxravAgirutatxdeyoV sherxVSaThxnAda tananx guruvinalilx tirxkaraNa\-gaLiMda parxBAvitavAgirutatxdo avanu shiSayx. aMtaha shiSayxna savxrUpAdigaLanunx nirUpisuva sathxla:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
shiSayxsathxlaM tataH porxVkatxM shushUrxSAsathxlameVva ca |\\[2pt]
shAsaniVyoV BaveVdayxsutx parakAyeVna savaRdA |\\[2pt]
tatapxrXsAdAtutx moVkASxthiRV sa shiSayx iti kiVtiRtaH ||\\[2pt]
BAvoV yasayx sithxroV nitayxM manoVvAkAkxyakamaRBiH |\\[2pt]
gurw nijeV guNoVdAreV sa shiSayx iti giVyateV ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(si. shi., 17. 4, 58-59)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\ullekha{shiSayxsathxla, shushUrxSAsathxla, seVvayxsathxla I oMbatutx shivaliMgasathxlaMgaLu (savasaM. 14; SaNumxKa. 780-355); joyxVti soVMki\-da(ra?)lA joyxVtiyAdaMte gurukAruNayxdiMda saMjAta\break shiSayxM guruviDidu guruvenipapxneY shiSayxsathxlaM keVLida (viVsheYpu.\break 8-126-30); apiRta tirxvidhasathx\-leVkavAda liMgaparxsAdi\-yupadeVshamuKadalilx shiSayxBAvavaneyidxda BeVdaveMtidiRtetxMdoDe muMde shiSayxsathxlaveMbudu (keYvasha. 118-1 sUtarxM).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{shiSayxsathxla - shiSayxsathxlaM, shiSayxH iti sathxlaM shiSayxsathxlaM}}
\end{entry}
%sUthxlatanuvinalilx AkArasavxrUpavAda... shiSayxsathxlavilalx kANA guruniraMjana cananxbasavaliMgA. (savasaM. 12; deVshikeVM. 672-201);

\begin{entry}

I shiSaTxvAda mAyeyu shivayoVgige Odana(ananx)vAgiruva sathxla:}}

\begin{entry}
\word{shiVla}\label{shiVla}
\meaning{\artha{sharaNAgatarAdavara duHKavanunx nivArisuva parabarxhamx\-savxrUpiyAda shivanalilx tananx BAvavanunx sithxragoLisuvudu, shiva\-nobabxnanenxV ariyuvudu, shivadhAnadalilx EkAgarxte, shiva\-pArxpitxyalilx utakxTavAda bayake modalAdavugaLa yoVga:}}

shiVlaM shiveYkavijAcnxnaM shivadhAyxneYkatAnatA |\\[1pt]

\end{shl}
\pauthor{(si. shi., 13. 31-32)}
\newpage
\newmeaning{\artha{viVrasheYvaru pAlisabeVkAda niyamagaLu:} \ullekha{iMtu videyx guNa jAcnxna dhamaR AcAra shiVlaMgaLa namamx kUDalasaMgana \hbox{sharaNaru} sAdhisida sAdhaneyane sAdhisudU (savasaM. 1; basava.\break 612-153); shiVla shiVlaveMdu gaviRsi nuDivutipapxru shiVla\-vAvudeMdariyaru idudxda vaMcaneya mADadipupxde shiVla, ilalxdidudxdakekx kaDana beVDadipupxde shiVla, paradhana parasatigeLasadipupxde shiVla, paradeYva parasamayakekxLasadipupxde shiVla, guruniMde shivaniMde jaMgamaniMdeya keVLadipupxde shiVla (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 176-57); iMtivipaRtatxnAlikxV te\char'273da shiVlagaLanaMtavuMTeY (viVsheYpu. 7-113-32).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{shiVla + Gacnf athavA - shiVknf + lakf - shiVlati iti - shiVlaM}}
\vskip -2pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\SEE{aruvatutx nAlukx shiVlagaLu}}}

\meaning{\arthanonum{viVrasheYveVtara sheYvaguru. iMtha sheYvaguru\break koTaTx diVkeSxge viVra\-sheYva\-dalilx mAnayxte ilalx:}

\begin{entry}

\medskip
\pauthor{(si. shi., 5. 7-8, 14)}

\begin{entry}

\src{va}
