\vskip 4pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad sAmAnayxsheYva: keVvala viBUtipaTaTxdiMdaleV shudadhxnAgi, A mUlaka sheYvanenisikoLuLxvavaneV sAmAnayxsheYva. deVva, dAnava athavA mAnavariMda parxtiSAThxpisalapxTaTx liMgavanunx dashaRna, nama\-sAkxra, acaRna matutx parxdakiSxNe mADuvudu ivana muKayx lakaSxNa. ivanige shivakiVtiR, shivavacana, shivaBakatxralilx pirxVti.}}
\vskip 4pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad misharxsheYva: misharxsheYvanu keVvala sAthxvaraliMgavananxSeTxV alalxde, viSuNx, deVvi, SaNumxKa, gaNapati, sUyaR, iMdArxdi deVvategaLa pUjeyanunx mADutAtxne. avanige yAvoMdu deYvavU doDaDx\-dalalx; yAvoMdu saNaNxdalalx, elalx deYvagaLalilxyU avanige samAna Bakitxyide. kelavu veVLe avanu uLidelalx deYvagaLanunx shivasamAnaveMdu tiLidu, adaraMte pUjisutAtxne.}}
\vskip 4pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad shudadhxsheYva: shivana udedxVshadiMda janisidavanu shudadhxsheYva. A shudadhxsheYvaniMda huTiTxdavanu sheYva bArxhamxNa athavA AdisheYva. aMdare, shivana aidu muKagaLalilx huTiTxda kwshika, kAshayxpa, BAradAvxja, atirx matutx gwtamareMba aidu shivadiVkiSxtara vaMshadavarelAlx sheYva bArxhamxNaru. ivaru veVdoVkatx, shAsotxrXVkatx samasatx kirxyAdigaLanunx mADuvavaru. hAgU sAthxvaraliMgapUje mADuvavaru.}}
\vskip 4pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad shudadhxsheYvara shivapUjeyu AtAmxthaR matutx parAthaR eMdu eraDu vidhavAgide. guru \hbox{koTaTx} liMgavanunx pUje mADuvudeV AtAmxthaR pUje. parxtiSAThxpitavAda shivaliMgapUjeyanunx elalxrigU hita\-vAguva udedxVshadiMda mADidare, parAthaR pUje enisikoLuLxtatxde. Adare shudadhx sheYvanu viSuNx itAyxdi deYvagaLanunx shivAvaraNagaLalilx AtAmxthaRkAkxgi athavA parAthaRkAkxgi pUjisa\-bAradu; oMdu veVLe viSuNx itAyxdi deYvagaLanunx parAthaRvAgi pUjisidare aMtha deYvagaLu shivana parivAradavareMdu tiLidu pUjisa\-beVku. Adare shivAlayada horage iruva viSuNx, sapatxmAtaqke muMtAdavara vigarxhagaLa pUje vajayxR. kirxyAdigaLa mUlaka mADuva pUje\-giMta maMtarxgaLa mUlaka mADuva liMgapUjeyu utatxma. aMthavana shariVravu maMtarxpiMDavAgi avanu shivAnugarxhakekx ahaRnAgutAtxne.}}
\vskip 4pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad I mUru parxBeVdagaLigiMta viVrasheYvavu utatxma\-vAdudu. viVrasheYvara AcAragaLu bahaLa sulaBavAduvu. alalxde adariMda laBayxvAguva jAcnxnavu athavA liMgAMga aikayxvu keYlAsa muMtAda lABagaLigiMta hecicxnadu. \hbox{viVrasheYvanu} jAcnxna athavA videyxyalilx (`vi') ramisuvavanu (`ra') athavA vinoVdisutitxruvavanu eMdAdudariMda avanu shamadamAdi SaTfsaMpatitxyiMda shoVBisutitxrutAtxne, alalxde avanu mAyeyanunx gedadxvanAdudariMda avananunx\break viVramAheVshavxraneMdU kareyalAgutatxde. shiveYkayxrAda \hbox{viVrasheYvaru} jAcnxnayajacnxdalilx niratarAgirutAtxre. avarige yAva sAvxthaRpara AsegaLU ilalxvAdudariMda avaru kamaR\-yoVgigaLU hwdu. itara sheYvaru mADabeVkeMdu iciCxsidadhx elalx satAkxyaRgaLanUnx viVrasheYvaru bahiraMgadalilx mADi toVrisutAtxre.}}
\vskip 4pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad viVrasheYvadalUlx mUru parxBeVdagaLive. aveMdare sAmAnayx, visheVSa matutx nirABAri. hasatxmasatxka saMyoVga\-vanonxLagoMDa diVkeSxya mUlaka viVrasheYvanAdavanu sAmAnayx viVrasheYva. avanu paMcAkaSxrimaMtarxdiMda diVkeSx paDedu utatxmAMgAdi yAvudAdarU sAthxnadalilx iSaTxliMgavanUnx viBUtiyanUnx dharisutAtxne, hAgU, parxti dina oMdu sAri, sAdhayxvAdare eraDu sAri, sAdhayxvAdare mUru sAri adanunx pUjisutAtxne.}}
\vskip 4pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad shudadhxviVrasheYvaru mADuva diVkASxvidhAnavanunx anusarisi, shivakuMBavanunx sAthxpisi, adaralilxruva shivananunx pUjisi, diVkoSxVtasxvakekx baMdiruva oDeyarugaLanunx saMtuSaTx\-goLisuva saluvAgi avarige viBUti viVLeyavanunx koDuvavanu visheVSa viVrasheYva. avanu guru heVLida elalx diVkASxkamaRgaLanunx mADuvudalalxdeV tananx malatarxyagaLanUnx nimURlana mADikoLuLxtAtxne. shivAcAyaRnu aMtha visheVSa viVrasheYva shiSayxnanunx kaqpAdaqSiTxyiMda noVDi, avana deVhavanunx citf shariVravanAnxgi mADutAtxne. anaMtara diVkiSxtanu SaTfcakarx, SaDaMga matutx SaDadhavxgaLanunx jAgaqtagoLisutAtxne. visheVSa viVrasheYvanu tananx deVha matutx pArxNa beVrAgada hAge vatiRsutAtxne, aMdare avanu liMgadalilx pArxNavaninxrisi tananx elalx kelasa matutx ciMtanegaLanunx liMgABimuKavAgi mADutAtxne.}}
\vskip 4pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad nirABAri viVrasheYvanu sakala sAMsArika vAyxpAragaLanunx dUriVkarisi, daMDa, kwpiVna, kASAyAMbara, jaTAbaMdha, nAruDugegaLanunx dharisi, citatxdalilx shivaliMgavanunx parxtiSAThxpisikoMDirutAtxne. avanu kUruvudu kaqSANxjina athavA vAyxGArxjinada meVle, keVLuvudu shivaliVlAkathana, BuMjisuvudu niyata BikASxnanx. sAvxthaRtAyxga mADida avanige yAva pApavU pArxyashicxtatxvU ilalx.}}

\vskip 4pt
\newmeaning{\artha{jihevx matutx guhayx apf tatatxvXda vikasita rUpagaLu. alilx parxtiSAThx\-kaleyeMba Bakitx ide, adaralilx jAcnxnashakitxyutavAda guruliMga idudx, adanunx dharisida sAdhakanu maheVshanenisikoLuLxtAtxne.}}
\vskip 4pt
\newmeaning{\artha{neVtarx matutx pAdagaLu aginxtatatxvXda rUpAMtara. avu\-gaLalilx vidAyxkaleyeMba Bakitx ide, adaralilx icACxshakitxyutavAda \hbox{shivaliMga} idudx, adanunx dharisidavanu parxsAdiyenisikoLuLxtAtxne.}}
\vskip 4pt
\newmeaning{\artha{tavxkukx matutx pANigaLu vAyutatatxvXda rUpAMtara. avu\-gaLalilx shAMtikalA eMba Bakitxyide. adaralilx Adishakitx\-yuta\-vAda jaMgamaliMgavidudx adanunx dharisidavanu pArxNaliMgi enisi\-koLuLxtAtxne.}}
\vskip 4pt
\newmeaning{\artha{shorxVtarx matutx vAgiMdirxyagaLu parAshakitxya beVre rUpagaLu. avugaLalilx shAMtayxtiVta kaleyeMba Bakitxyidudx, adaralilx parAshakitxyutavAda parxsAdaliMgavidudx, adanunx dharisikoMDAta sharaNanenisikoLuLxtAtxne.}}
\vskip 4pt
\newmeaning{\artha{Atamx eMba aMgakekx manasesxMba cicaCxkitxrUpada \hbox{shakitxyidudx}, adaroLage shAMtayxtiVtoVtatxra kale eMba Bakitx ide, adaralilxruva cicaCxkitxyutavAda mahAliMgavanunx dharisidavanu aikayxnenesi\-koLuLxtAtxne.}}
\vskip 4pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{manuSayxna karaNeVMdirxyagaLalilxruva I Aru liMgagaLanunx iSaTxliMgadaMte dharisabeVkAgilalx. sAdhakanu kalegaLeMba Bakitxya sahAyadiMda, A shakitxgaLanunx AdhAyxtimxka udedxVshakekx pAradashaRka mADi, avugaLalilxruva liMgavanunx noVDidare, liMgadhAraNe mADidaMteyeV.}

\begin{entry}

\src{va}
\meaning{\arthanonum{shivaBakatxru viBUti dharisa\-beVkeMba niyamavide. Adare yArAyxru yAvAva sathxladalilx dharisidare yAvAva lABagaLuMTAgutatxve eMbu\-danunx cenanx\-basavaNaNxnavaru I riVti tiLisikoDutAtxre:}}

\vskip 4pt
\newmeaning{\artha{kirxyAdiVkeSx paDeda upAdhika Bakatxru tamamx shariVrada hadinAru sAthxnagaLalilx viBUtidhAraNe mADabeVku; avarige guruliMgajaMgamada sadaBxkitx Palisuvudu.}}
\vskip 4pt
\newmeaning{\artha{kirxyAdiVkeSx matutx maMtarxdiVkeSx paDeda nirupAdhika Bakatxru tamamx aMgada mUvatetxraDu sAthxnagaLalilx viBUtidhAraNe mADabeVku; avarige tirxvidha pAdoVda parxsAda doreyutatxde yoVgayx\-rAgutAtxre.}}
\vskip 4pt
\newmeaning{\artha{kirxyAdiVkeSx, maMtarxdiVkeSx matutx veVdhAdiVkeSx paDeda \hbox{sahaja} Bakatxru tamamx shariVrada mUvatAtxru sAthxnagaLalilx viBUtiyanunx dharisabeVku. avarige sacicxdAnaMda pada doreyutatxde.}}
\vskip 4pt
\newmeaning{\artha{kirxyAdiVkeSx, maMtarxdiVkeSx, veVdhAdiVkeSx matutx sacicxdAnaMda diVkeSxyanunx paDeda nivaRMcana Bakatxru nalavatutxnAlukx sAthxnagaLalilx viBUtiyanunx dharisabeVku. avarige nivARNapada laBisutatxde.}}
\vskip 4pt
\newmeaning{\artha{koneyadAgi, kirxyAdiVkeSx, maMtarxdiVkeSx, veVdhAdiVkeSx, sacicxdA\-naMdadiVkeSx matutx nivARNapadadiVkeSxgaLanunx paDeda \hbox{sadaBxkatxru} tamamx aMgada nAlavxtetxMTu sAthxnagaLalilx maMtarxvanunx paThisutAtx viBUtidhAraNe mADabeVku, avarige, jaMgama\-roDanATa matutx parashivanoDane kUTa uMTAgi, koneyalilx niravaya samAdhi uMTAgutatxde:}
\ullekha{ayAyx, viBUtiya \hbox{dharisuva} BeVdaveMteMdaDe: sahaja liMga\-dhArakaru eMTu sAthxnadalilx dharisuvudayAyx. kirxyAdiVkeSx, maMtarx\-diVkeSx, veVdhA diVkeSx\-yukatxrAda sahajaBakatxru mUvatAtxru sAthxnadalilx dharisuvudayAyx. kirxyAdiVkeSx, maMtarxdiVkeSxyukatxrAda nirupAdhiBakatxru mUvatetxraDu sAthxnadalilx dharisuvudayAyx kirxyAdiVkASxnivxtarAda upAdhiBakatxru hadinAru sAthxnadalilx dharisuvudayAyx kirxyAdiVkeSx maMtarxdiVkeSx, veVdhAdiVkeSx, sacicxdAnaMdadiVkASxyukatxrAda nivaRMcana Bakatxru.\break nAlavxtutxnAlukx sAthxnadalilx dharisuvudayAyx. kirxyA-maMtarx-veVdhA-\-sacicxdAnaMda - nivARNapadadiVkASxsamanipxtarAda sadaBxkatxsharaNagaNaMgaLu. apAdamasatxka pariyaMtara sAnxna dhULanava mADi nAlavxtetxMTu sAthxnadalilx maMtarxsamxraNeyiMda tirxpuMDarxva dharisuvu\-dayAyx kUDala cenanxsaMgamadeVvA (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 931-295).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{SaDivxdhaM ca tatf viBUteVH dhAraNaM ca - SadivxdhaviBUti\-dhAraNaM}}

\begin{entry}

\meaning{\artha{kirxyAshakitx, jAcnxnashakitx, icACxshakitx, Adishakitx, parAshakitx, cicaCxkitx eMba Aru vidha shakitxgaLu. ivugaLu karxmavAgi Bakatxsathxla, mAheVshavxrasathxla, parxsAdisathxla, pArxNaliMgisathxla, sharaNa\-sathxla, aikayx\-sathxlagaLige saMbaMdhisive. I Aru vidhada shakitxgaLige anukarxmavAgi nivaqtitxkale, parxtiSAThxkale, vidAyxkale, shAMtikale, shAMtayx\-tiVtakale, shAMtayxtiVtoVtatxrakale eMba payARya hesarugaLive:}}

\begin{shl}

nivaqtitxH sAyxtf kirxyAshakitxriti payARyasaMgatiH |\\[2pt]
cicaCxkitxshacx parAshakitxrAdishakitxsatxtheYva ca ||\\[2pt]

\ullekha{iMtu \hbox{cicaCxkitx} karxmadiMde SaDivxdhakaleyanAMtu SaDivxdha shakitxyAdaLA parashivaM piMte SaDivxdha liMgavAgiduR karxmadoLiV shakitxyaroLoDagUDida (cebapu. 61-14).}}

\begin{entry}

\begin{entry}

\src{kA}

\begin{entry}
\word{SaDivxdhasamapaRNe}\label{SaDivxdhasamapaRNe}
\src{va}
\meaning{\arthanonum{Bakatxsathxlada sAdhakana padAthaR\-gaLanunx guruliMgajaMgamakUkx, sugaMdhavasutxgaLanunx AcAraliMgakUkx samapiRsabeVku. maheVsha sathxlada sAdhakanu haNuNx modalAda rasaBarita vasutxgaLanunx guruliMgakUkx, parxsAdisathxlada sAdhakanu piVta, shevxVta muMtAda vasAtxrXdigaLanunx, shivaliMgakUkx, pArxNa\-liMgada sAdhakanu kwpiVna, uDudAra muMtAda padAthaR\-gaLanunx (aMdare, sapxshaRnavanunx) tananx satikxrXyegaLa mUlaka\break jaMgama\-liMgakUkx, sharaNasathxlada sAdhakanu shabodxV\-tApxdaka vasutx\-gaLAda gaMTe, taMtivAdayxgaLu muMtAda vasutxgaLanunx (aMdare\break shabadxvanunx) parxsAdaliMgakUkx, koneyadAgi, aikayxsathxlada \hbox{sAdhakanu} tanenxlalxvanUnx mahAliMgakekx samapiRsi, paripUNaR taqpitx paDeyabeVku:} \ullekha{I SaDivxdha \hbox{darxvayx} padAthaRM\-gaLu doreya\-didadxre mUlacitatx moda\-lAda aMga mana pArxNa iMdirxya karaNa viSayaMgaLa A shirxVguruviMge jaMgamada somumxsaMbaMdhadalilx nilisuvude savARMgaliMgApaRNavAgipuRdu (savasaM. 14; mUrumu. 39-43)}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{SaDivxdhaM ca tatf samapaRNeM ca - SaDivxdha samapaRNeM}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{SaDivxdhahasatx}\label{SaDivxdhahasatx}
\meaning{\arthanonum{Bakatxnu SaTasxthXlagaLa parxkAra sadAcAriyAgidudx ELige\-yanunx hoMduvudakekx sahAyakavAguva sucitatx, subudidhx, nirahaMkAra, sumana, sujAcnxna matutx sadABxva eMba Aru tatatxvXgaLu:}
\ullekha{A BakitxgaLige BAva jAcnxna mana budidhx citatx ahaMkAraM\-gaLane SaDivxdhahasatxMgaLeMdenisi (savasaM. 5; akakxma. 58-21); kucitatxvaLidu sucitatx nelegoMDalalxde A hasatxkekx AcAraliMga sAdhayxvAgadu ...duBARvavaLidu sadABxva nelegoMDalalxde A hasatxkekx\break mahA\-liMga sAdhayxvAgadu iMtiV SaDivxdhahasatx savxsathxvAgi nele\-goMDalalxde SaDivxdhaliMga sAdhayxvAgadu (mishApaR. 680-9).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{SaDivxdha hasatx - SaDivxdhahasatxH; SaDivxdhashacx asw hasatxshacx - SaDivxdhahasatxH}}
\end{entry}

\medskip
\begin{shl}
kuSxtipxpAseV maheVshAni shoVkamoVhw janimaqRtiH |\\[3pt]
saMsArAdhUbxyXmaRyashecxVtA yathAbAdhxvUmaRyasatxthA ||\\[3pt]
kuSxtipxpAseV pArxNadhamwR shoVkamoVhw manoVgatw |\\[3pt]
jananaM maraNaM ceVti deVhadhamwR SaDUmaRyaH ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(pAra. A., 6. 67-68)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\ullekha{kuSxtutx pipAse shoVka moVha jare maraNaveMba SaDUmiRgaLa \hbox{vamaRva} tiLidu (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1000-331); ariSaDavxgaRMgaLu SaDUmiRgaLu... aMtaHkaraNagaLu iMtivAdi\-yAgi toV{\ru}va toVrikeyeVnU nAnalalx nananxvalalx (savasaM. 5; akakxma. 58-29); SaDuvUmiR SaDavxgaR toDara\-diha liMgeYkayx (diVkASxboV. 119-15).}}

\vskip 4pt

\vskip 4pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad sharaNasathxladalilxruvavana vishudidhxcakarxvanunx AkAsha tatatxvXvu sututx\-varedide. shabadxvanunx parxdhAnaguNavAgi uLaLx AkAshatatatxvXvu\break parAshakitxya matotxMdu rUpu; adakekx sadAshivaneV adhi\-deVvate; I cakarxda madhayxdalilx parxsAdaliMgavide; sharaNanu \hbox{AkAshada} parxdhAna guNavanunx sadAshivanige aMdare, parashivana shivana sAdAKayxdalilxruva shorxVtarxveMba bAyige tananx AnaMda tanuvina \hbox{sujAcnxna} hasatxdiMda, sushabadxveMba padAthaRvanunx apiRsi, adanunx sushabadxveMba parxsAdavanAnxgisikoMDu BoVgisutAtxne. parashivananunx hiVge sUkaSxmX riVtiyalilx pUjisuva sAdhakananunx sadAshivapUjAriyeMdu kareyalAgutatxde.}}
\vskip 4pt

\begin{entry}

\meaning{\artha{sharxdedhx, vishAvxsadiMda kUDida BAva.}
\ullekha{BAva \hbox{sadABxva} niBARvaveMba BAvatarxyaMgaLalilx BaritavAgi BAvabarxhamxveMba BeVdavilalxde saninxhitaBAvadiMdipupxdeV BAvaliMga (savasaM. 6; Adayayx. 765-230); BAva sadABxva niBARvaveMba BAvatarxyavuLaLxvana deVvareMdenenx (savasaM. 11; toVMTasi. 23-10).} \artha{sadABxvahasatx AcArAdi SaDilxMgagaLige BAvApaNe mADuva sAdhanaBUtavAda BAvahasatx. aikayxsathxladalilxruva sAdhakanu mahAliMgakekx haqdayamuKadalilx pariNAma padAthaRvanunx samapiRsi, taqpitx parxsAdavanunx sivxVkarisuva hasatx:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}

nitayxM BAveVna hasetxVna ca samAsaBakitx parxsakatxH savxyaM sanf |
\end{shl}

\begin{shl}

tasAmxlalxbadhxM vishudadhxM GanatarapariNAmaparxsAdaM BajeVta ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(a.sU. 7-50)}
\smallskip

\begin{entry}
\word{sadoyxVjAta}\label{sadoyxVjAta}
\meaning{\artha{sadoyxVjAta, vAmadeVva, aGoVra, \hbox{tatupxruSa}, IshAna eMba parashivana aidu muKagaLalilx pashicxma dikikxna muKa. I muKadiMda janisida naMdA eMba hasuvina goVmayadiMda viBUtiyanunx tayArisalAgutatxde. \hbox{parashivana} I muKadiMda reVNukaneMba gaNeVshavxranu janisidanu:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
naMdA BadArx ca suraBiH sushiVlA sumanAsatxthA ||\\[2pt]
paMcagAvoV viBoVjARtAH sadoyxVjAtAdivakatxrXtaH |\\[2pt]
sadoyxVjAtAdivxBUtishacx... ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(si. shi., 7. 7, 9)}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
sadoyxVjAtaM ca parxthamaM vAmadeVvaM divxtiVyakamf |\\[2pt]
viVroV naMdiV vaqSashecxYva BaqMgiV sakxMdasatxtheYva ca |\\[2pt]
matasxvXrUpAH samutapxnAnxH paMcagoVtArxdhikAriNaH ||\\[2pt]
reVNukoV dArukashecxYva shaMKukaNaRshacx dheVnukaH |\\[2pt]
vishavxkaNaRshacx paMceYteV paMcagoVtarxsamudaBxvAH |\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(viV. sa. saM., 1. 26, 28-29)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{maheVshavxrana aidu mUtiRgaLalilx modalaneyadu. hasuvina hAlinaMtaha, shaMKadaMtaha biLiya vaNaR; jaTAmakuTagaLiMda alaMkaqta; nAlukx muKa, nAlukx toVLugaLu; hanenxraDu kaNuNxgaLu; eDa hasatxgaLalilx TaMka shUlAyudha\-gaLanunx dharisida; balahasatxgaLalilx aBaya, varada muderxgaLanunxLaLx; biLiya vasatxrXvanunx utatxriVyavanAnxgi dharisida; elalx bageya ABaraNa\-gaLiMda alaMkaqtavAda rUpa:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
goVkiSxVrashaMKavaNARBaM jaTAmakuTamaMDitamf ||\\[2pt]
catuvaRkatxrXM catubARhuM neVterxYdAvxRdashaBiyuRtamf |\\[2pt]
saveyxV tu TaMkashUleV cABayaM varadamanayxkeV ||\\[2pt]
shukalxvasatxrXdharaM ceYva shukalxvasotxrXVtatxriVyakamf |\\[2pt]
savARBaraNasaMyukatxmf EvaM sadayxmudAhaqtamf ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(vA. shu. A., 7. 42-44)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{parashivana aidu muKagaLalolxMdAda sadoyxVjAta muKavanunx parxtipAdisuva maMtarx:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
sadoyxVjAtaM parxpadAyxmi sadoyxVjAtAya veY namoV namaH |\\[2pt]
BaveV BaveV nAtiBaveV Bavasavx mAM BavoVdaBxvAya namaH ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(ma. nA. u., 4)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\ullekha{sadoyxVjAta vAmadeVva aGoVra tatupxruSa IshAnaveMba paMcabarxhamxmaMtarxMgaLaM ...lwkika deVsha BASAmaMtarxMgaLaM beV{\re} beV{\re} viveVkisi noVDi (viveVka. 75); haqdayave aGoVra, guhayxve vAmadeVva, pAdave sadoyxVjAta maMtarxvayAyx!\break (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1324-469); iMtivu maMtarx\-mUtiRya vaNaRBeVdaveMdarivudayayx matetx nakAraveV sadoyxVjAta\-maMtarxmUtiR (savasaM. 11; toVMtasi. 200-96); OM hArxM nAM sadoyxVjAtAya namaH - idu pAdakekx saMbaMdhavAgutatxde ...OM harxH OM haqdayAya namaH idu savARMgadalilx saMbaMdhavAgutatxde. I maMtarxgaLige anukarxmavAgi sadoyxVjAtamaMtarx, vAmadeVvamaMtarx, aGoVramaMtarx, tatupxruSamaMtarx, IshAnamaMtarx, haqdayamaMtarx eMdu hesaru. BasomxVdUdhxLana kAladali I maMtarxgaLanunx nishicxta saMKeyxyalilx ucacxrisutatx AyA sAthxnagaLalilx Basitavanunx dharisikoLuLxvudu (shivAkoV. 158-257).} \artha{viBUtiyanunx tayArisuvAga aginxyiMda suTaTx goVmaya\-vanunx uMDe mADuvAga vAmadeVva maMtarxdoMdige I maMtarxvanUnx baLasabeVkeMdu shAsatxrXda niyama:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
yathAshAsotxrXVkatxvidhinA gaqhiVtAvx goVmayaM navamf ||\\[2pt]
sadeyxVna vAmadeVveVna kuyARtf piMDamanutatxmamf |\\[2pt]
pAdw sadeyxVna savARMgaM parxNaveVneYva seVcayeVtf |\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(si. shi., 7. 15, 23)}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
AgenxVyaM Basamx sadoyxVjAtAdipaMcabarxhamxmaMterxYH parigaqhayx... |\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip

\src{va}
\meaning{\arthanonum{parashiva matutx jiVvara \hbox{naDuvina} saMbaMdha. parashiva matutx parxpaMcada naDuvina saMbaMdha ivugaLa vicAravAgi mAtanADuvAga viVrasheYvAcAyaRru sAgara taraMga nAyxyavanunx baLasikoLuLxtAtxre. jiVvana doVSagaLU, parxpaMcada doVSagaLU parashivanige taTuTxvudilalx: taqNa matutx kaNagaLu sAgaradalilxve \hbox{eMdare}, sAgarada ALa matutx gAMBiVyaR taqNa matutx kaNagaLalilxve eMdAguvudilalx. taqNa matutx kaNagaLu athavA nore matutx teregaLu sAgarada kaSxNika avasethxgaLeV horatu, adara sArasavxBAvavalalx. barxhamx, viSuNx muMtAda\-varU, hulumAnavarU parashivanalilxdadxrU avarArU parashivanaMte paripUNaRralalx, nitayxralalx, shudadhxralalx. noreteregaLu, taqNakaNagaLu sAgaravananxvalaMbisuvaMte \hbox{barxhamx}, viSuNx, modalAda adhideVvategaLU mAnavarU, pArxNigaLU, BwtavishavxvU parashivananenxV avalaMbisutatxve. avara doVSagaLu, avara anitayxte, parashivanige tAguvudilalx. oMdu veVLe,\break carAcaravasutxgaLanUnx adhideVvategaLanUnx oLagoMDa iDiV\break jagatatxnenxV parashivana shariVraveMdu parigaNisidarU, A shariVrada doVSagaLu avanige tAguvudilalx. liMgAMgasAmarasayx paDeda mAnavananenxV deYhika matutx parisarada bAdhegaLu piVDisuvu\-dilalxveMda meVle, nitayxmukatxnAda parashivananunx 35 tatatxvXgaLa shariVravu heVge tAneV piVDisabalalxdu?:}
\ullekha{matatxM, shivane jiVva\-nAdoDe jiVvaMguMTAda jananAdi doVSaMgaLivaMguMTA\-dapudalAyene sAgarataraMganAyxyadaMtaBeVdaM (savasaM. 11; imamxDi. 1309-602).}}
\end{entry}

\meaning{\arthanonum{sAdhAra, nirAdhAra (AdhAravajiRtA) eMba eraDu vidhada diVkeSxgaLalilx oMdu. guruvanAnxsharxyisi maMda\-shakitxnipAtadiMda Ishavxranu anugarxhisuva diVkeSx sAdhAradiVkeSx:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
seVyaM diVkASx divxdhA BinAnx sAdhArAdhAravajiRtA |\\[2pt]
gurumUtiRM samAshirxtayx maMdashakitxnipAtanAtf |\\[2pt]
kuruteV sakalaseyxVshaH sAdhArAM tAmimAM viduH ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\smallskip
\pauthor{(shi. ta. ra., 9. 7. 6, 8)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\ullekha{vishiSaTxM diVyateV jAcnxnaM kiSxVyateV pApasaMcayaH | \hbox{anayoVH} shAsaneV sidAdhx diVkASx kaSxpaNadAnayoVH. A diVkeSx nirAdhAra diVkeSx\-yeMdu, sAdhAradiVkeSxyeMdu eraDu parxkAramapupxdu (savasaM. 9; shAMtaviV. 1375-519); sAdhAraveMbA diVkeSx bahuvidha\-valA niVna{\ri}vudeY (viVsheYpu. 6-97-64).}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{sAmAnayxviVrasheYva}\label{sAmAnayxviVrasheYva}
\meaning{\arthanonum{sAmAnayx, visheVSa, nirABAri eMba mUru vidhada viVrasheYvaralilx obabx. iSaTxliMga, pArxNaliMga, BAvaliMga eMba mUru vidhada liMgagaLanunx oMdeV BAvane\-yiMda pUjisuvudu; guru-liMga-jaMgamagaLalilx samAnavAda Bakitx; upalabadhxvAda vasutxgaLiMda tirxkAla iSaTxliMga\-pUje mADuvudu viVrasheYvana sAmAnayx dhamaR:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
iSATxdiliMgatirxtayaseyxYkiVBAveVna cAcaRnamf ||\\[2pt]
gurw mAheVshavxreV sevxVSaTxliMgeV ca samaBAvanA |\\[2pt]
tirxkAlaM liMgapUjA ca saMBavadiBxH padAthaRkeYH ||\\[2pt]
sAmAnayxviVrasheYvasayx dhamoRV{\char'263}yaM parikiVtiRtaH |\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(caM. A., kirx. pA., 10. 36-37; sU. A., kirx. pA., 7. 30-38; vA. shu. A., 10. 34-37; pAra. A., 15. 31-41)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\ullekha{baLikA viVrasheYvane kirxyABeVdadiM sAmAnayx viVrasheYvaneMdu, \hbox{visheVSa} viVrasheYvaneMdu, nirABAri viVrasheYvaneMdu tirxvidha \hbox{mAgipaR} (savasaM. 9; shAMtaviV. 1447-541); shirxVguruvina hasatxmasatxkasaMyoVgadiM viBUtiya paTaTxdiM shivamaMtorxVpa\-deVshadiM liMgAMgasaMgiyAgi ...guruliMga BasitaMgaLalilx Bakitx\-yukatxnAgipApxtaneV sAmAnayx viVrasheYvanapapxM (viveVka. 98).}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{sAmAnayxshiSayx}\label{sAmAnayxshiSayx}
%\src{saM}
\meaning{\arthanonum{shiSayxBeVda; sAmAnayx shiSayxralilx vaMshayxshiSayx hAgU AgaMtuka shiSayx eMba eraDu parxbeVdhagaLalilx oMdu; vaMshayxshiSayxralilx mUla hAgU sAmAnayx eMba parxBeVdagaLalilx oMdu. upa\-sUtarxkekx saMbaMdhisida shiSayx:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
vaMshayx AgaMtukashecxVti divxvidhaH shiSayx ucayxteV |\\[2pt]
muKayxH sAmAnayx iteyxVvaM punavaRMshoyxV divxdhA mataH ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(viV. sa. saM., 14. 2)}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{sAmAnayxsheYva}\label{sAmAnayxsheYva}
\meaning{\artha{sapatxsheYvagaLalilx oMdu. sAmAnayxsheYva AcaraNegaLige saMbaMdhisida sheYva. sAthxvaraliMgavanunx \hbox{pUji\-suva} sheYva. sAthxvaraliMgada pUje, dashaRna, parxdakiSxNe, namasAkxra\-gaLanunx mADuvudu, Basamx-rudArxkaSxdhAraNadiMda shudadhx\-nAgi, shivAcaRne, shivakiVtaRne, shivAlApa modalAda shivasaMbaMdhi kAyaRgaLanunx tirxkaraNapUvaRkavAgi mADuvudu. ivu sAmAnayxsheYvada lakaSxNa:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
tatArxdw saMparxvakASxyXmi sheYvasAmAnayxlakaSxNamf ||\\[2pt]
shivaliMgaM yadA pasheyxVtf tadA kuyARtf samacaRnamf |\\[2pt]
parxdakiSxNaM parxNAmaM vA dashaRnaM vA{\char'263}tarx kArayeVtf ||
\end{shl}

\begin{shl}
BasamxdhAraNamAterxVNa shudodhxV Bavati savaRdA |\\[2pt]
shivakiVtwR tadAlApeV pirxVtimAnf shivaBakatxkeV ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(vA. shu. A., 10. 11-13)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{anAdisheYva modalAda eMTu vidhada sheYvagaLalilx oMdu. shAkatxru matutx elalx aidu matasathxru. SaDadhavxshoVdhana parxkirxye\-yiMda saMsAkxra hoMduva matutx gAyatirxV maMtarx\-vanunx sivxVkarisuva sheYva:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
shAkAtxdAyxH savaR EveYteV matapaMcakavatiRnaH ||\\[2pt]
adhavxshoVdhanasaMsAkxrAdf gAyatirxVgarxhaNAdapi |\\[2pt]
sAmAnayxsheYvA iti hi nigadayxMteV dharAtaleV ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(caM. A., kirx. pA., 10. 28-29)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\ullekha{tatArxdw saMparxvakASxyXmi sheYva sAmAnayxlakaSxNaM eMdu A nAlukx vidhavAda sheYvaMgaLoLage modalu sAmAnayxsheYva lakaSxNava\break heVLihenu... sAmAnayx sheYvanu viBUtiya \hbox{paTaTxmAtarx\-diMdale} shudadhx\-vAgutitxdAdxtanAgi savxyaMBuliMgavanAdareyU deVvadAnava mAnavAdigaLiM parxtiSiThxsalapxTaTx liMganAdareyU avaveVLeyalilx kaMDanu... sAmAnayx sheYva lakaSxNavu nirUpisalapxTiTxtutx (savasaM. 9; shAMtaviV. 1386-522).}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}

%\src{saM}
\meaning{\arthanonum{shivAMga, BUtAMga, kUTAMga, \hbox{vidAyxMga}, shakatxyXMga, sAmAnAyxMga eMba Aru aMgagaLalilx oMdu:}}

\begin{entry}
\word{sAmiVpayx}\label{sAmiVpayx}
\meaning{\artha{sAloVkayx, sAmiVpayx, sArUpayx, sAyujayx modalAda nAlukx vidhada mukitxgaLalilx oMdu. sAmiVpayx\-mukitx. sAdhakana gaMdhaveV modalAda paMca\-tanAmxtarxrUpavAda sUkaSxmXshariVravu paramAtamxna sAninxdhayx\-vanunx talupidAga, shivana parxsAdadiMda uMTAguva mukitx:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
sAmiVpayxM yAti sAMbasayx tanAmxterxV tu vashaM gateV |\\[2pt]
tatAsxmiVpayxmiti porxVkatxM shivaseyxYva parxsAdataH ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(kirx. sA., BA-1, 3. 333)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\ullekha{kataRru nimamx gaNaMgaLu enanx totutx mADi salahida suKavu sAloVkayx sAmiVpayx sAyujayxdaMtuTalalx keVLayAyx (savasaM. 1; basava. 475-114); sAloVkayx sAmiVpayx sArUpayx sAyujayxdavarelalxru basavaNaNxnaMtahare (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1658-606).}
\artha{sAmiVpayxveMba moVkaSxpadaviyanunx gaLisidavanu; paramAtamxna sAninxdhayxdalilxruvavanu:}
\ullekha{nA niV eMba BeVda aMdU ilalx iMdU ilalx, sAloVkayxnalalx sAmiVpayxnalalx sharaNa ...guheVshavxraliMga tAneyAgi (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 689-185).}}
%\newmeaning{\arthanonum{devxYtigaLa parxkAra shudadhxvAda Atamxnu sAloVkayxda naMtara paramAtamxna baLi sArutAtxne. AdadxriMda idu eraDane haMta. (noVDi. sAloVkayx, sAyujayx matutx sArUpayx).}
%\ullekha{sAloVkayxM ca tu sAmiVpayxM sArUpayxM ca sAyujayxtA tadupeVkaSxka BakatxshacxkAravaM narakaM varxjeVtf|| (savasaM. 1; basava. 1367-377); `nA' `niV' eMba BeVda aMdU ilalx iMdU ilalx sAloVkayxnalalx sAmiVpayxnalalx sharaNa... (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 689-185); shivana shirxV pAdadalilx irabalalxDe sheYlAsave kalAyxNa liMgave tAnu. sAloVkayx sAmiVpayx sArUpayx sAyujayx iMtiV catuviRdhavane miVri... (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1105-376); sAloVkayx pada miVri sAmiVpayx pada miVri sAyujayx padaviVva Atananu vashamADi taMdenanx karagoLitAtx guru. (savasaM. 4; sidadhxrA. 1087-313); harana sAloVkayx sAmiVpayx sArUpayx sAyujayxdalilxrisuvudu... (savasaM. 5; akakxma. 424-127).}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{sAyujayx}\label{sAyujayx}
%\src{saM}
\meaning{\artha{sAmiVpayxveV modalAda nAlukx vidhada mukitx\-gaLalilx oMdu. baMdhamukatxnAda jiVvAtamxnu paramAtamx\-nalilx samarasa hoMduva sithxti (liMgAMgasAmarasayx sithxti). utatxmoVtatxma\-vAda mukitx idu:}}

\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(viV. u., 3. 27)}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
parxvAhAtf saMcitAgAmipArxrabadhxparipAkataH |\\[2pt]
viduSAM barxhamxBAveVna mukitxH sAyujayxrUpiNiV ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(kirx. sA., BA-2, 5. 5)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\ullekha{shirxVpAdagaLalilx enanx shirasapxrushanadiMda sASATxMgaveragalu sAyujayx\-padavayAyx (savasaM. 6; uripe. 1286-410).}
\artha{parxNava\-paMcakagaLalilx sAyujayxvu aidaneyadu. akAra, ukAra, makAra, hakAra (nAda) ivugaLoMdige hadinAlakxneya savxravAda aukAravanunx seVrisidare sAyujayxveMba parxNava uMTAgutatxde (a-u-ma-ha-au). paMcaparxNavagaLu \hbox{parashivana} paMcamuKagaLiMda AviBaRvisive eMba kAraNadiMda sAyujayx parxNavavu parashivana UdhavxRmuKavAda IshAna\-muKa\-diMda utapxnanxvAgide. I parxNavada parxkAsha saPxTika, \hbox{gAyatirxV} CaMdasusx, agasatxyX QuSi, BUta AkAsha, tatatxvX shivatatatxvX, sadAshiva adhideVvate, paMcamAterx biVja, Pala sAyujayx:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
sAkalayxM parxthamaM porxVkatxM shAMBavaM tu divxtiVyakamf |\\[2pt]
swKayxM taqtiVyamituyxkatxM sAvashayxM tu catuthaRkamf ||\\[2pt]
sAyujayxM paMcamaM porxVkatxM BeVdameVSAM shaqNu karxmAtf |\\[2pt]
sadAyxdipaMcavaketxrXVSu jAtaM parxNavapaMcakamf ||\\[2pt]
akAraH paMcamoVpeVtoV vagARMtoV nAdasaMyutaH |\\[2pt]
catudaRshasavxroVpeVtaM sAyujayxM coVdhavxRsaMBavamf ||\\[2pt]
sAyujayxM saPxTikaparxKayxM gAyatirxV CaMda Iritamf |\\[2pt]
agasotxyXV hi QuSishecxYva viyadUBxtamudiVritamf ||
\end{shl}

\begin{shl}
shivatatatxvXM samAKAyxtamadhideYvaM sadAshivaH |\\[2pt]
paMcamAtArxtamxkaM biVjaM sAyujayxPalasAdhakamf ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(sU. A., kirx. pA., 4. 5-73, 23, 32-33;}
\smallskip
\pauthor{vA. shu. A., 6. 4-5, 14-15, 23-25)}
\smallskip

%\newmeaning{\arthanonum{catuviRdha moVkaSx padavigaLalilx oMdu; baMdhamukatxnAda jiVvanu paramAtamxnalilx oMdAguva haMta.}}

\ullekha{anayxcitatxdalilxrisadirayAyx nimamx citatxdalilxrisayAyx. anupama\-suKasArAya sharaNaralilx (savasaM. 1; basava. 48-15); dUra[da] dhAtu sArAyadoLaDagitutx (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 235-72); hadinAlukx BuvanadoLagidadx nisAsxramaM biTuTx liMga\-sArAyamoVhiyAgi kUDalacenanxsaMganalilx nileRVpanAda \hbox{sharaNa} (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 670-200).}

\begin{entry}
\word{sArUpayx}\label{sArUpayx}
\meaning{\arthanonum{sAloVkayx, sAmiVpayx, sArUpayx, sAyujayxgaLeMba nAlukx vidhada mukitxgaLalilx oMdu. shivana anugarxhadiMda ahaMkAravu nAshavAgalu AyudhAdigaLiMda shivarUpada pArxpitx. I vidhada mukitxyu shivamaMtarxda japa matutx shivAcaRne\-yiMda uMTAgutatxde:}}

\medskip
\pauthor{(kirx. sA., BA-1, 3. 334)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\ullekha{kataRru nimamx gaNaMgaLu enanx totutx mADi salahida suKavu sAloVkayx sAmiVpayx sArUpayx sAyujayxdaMtuTalalx keVLayAyx (savasaM. 1; basava. 475-114); `nA' `niV' eMba BeVda aMdU ilalx, iMdU ilalx, sAloVkayx\-nalalx sAmiVpayxnalalx sharaNa. sArUpayxnalalx sAyujayxnalalx sharaNa, kAyanalalx akAyanalalx guheVshavxraliMga tAneyAgi (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 689-185); asamasArUpayxda padadi vatiRsabahudu sAyujayxdiMda berasi suKadoLiralapupxdu (basapu. 1-31); javanaLitxvaTuTx pAshavxRvaneyadxlilxyopupxva BAgayxvaMtaraM harana sArUpayxraM kaMDanA\-naMda\-diMda (viVsheYpu. 2-17-23).}}

\begin{entry}

\src{va}

\begin{entry}
\word{sAloVkayx}\label{sAloVkayx}
\meaning{\artha{nAlukx vidhada mukitxgaLalilx oMdu. shivaparxsAdadiMda kamaRdeVhavu vashavAgi shivaloVkadalilx nelesu\-vudu:}}

\meaning{\arthanonum{elalxriMda seVvayxnAgiruva shivasavxrUpiyAda shirxVguru:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
seVvoyxV guruH samasAtxnAM shiva Eva na saMshayaH |\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}

\pauthor{(si. shi., 18. 71)}
\smallskip

\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{seVvayxshacx asw gurushacx - seVvayxguruH}}
\end{entry}

AdiparxsAdisathxla, aMtayxparxsAdisathxla, seVvayxparxsAdisathxla... (savasaM. 14; SaNumxKa. 780-355).

\begin{entry}
\word{seVvayxparxsAdi}\label{seVvayxparxsAdi}
%\src{saM}
\meaning{\arthanonum{elalxriMdalU seVvayxnAgiruva shirxVguruvu sAkASxtf shivaneV hwdu. aMtaha shivasavxrUpi shirxVguruvina anuBavaveV (upadeVshAnuBavaveV) parxsAda enisutatxde. iMtaha guru matutx parxsAdavanunx EkarUpa\-diMda kaMDu anuBavi\-suva shivayoVgi:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
seVvoyxV guruH samasAtxnAM shiva Eva na saMshayaH |\\[2pt]
parxsAdoV{\char'263}sayx parAnaMdaparxkAshaH parikiVtayxRteV ||\\[2pt]
seVvoyxV guruH samxqqtoV hayxsayx parxsAdoV{\char'263}nuBavoV mataH |\\[2pt]
tadeVkAveVsharUpeVNa tadAvxnf seVvayxparxsAdavAnf ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(si. shi., 18. 71-72)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\ullekha{iSaTxliMgavanunx soVMki baMda parxsAdavu pArxNaliMgavanunx soVMki, Aga uMTAda parxsAdavanunx sivxVkarisalu adu seVvayxparxsAdiyu (shivAkoV. 110-156).}
\artha{jaMgamaparxsAdavanunx sivxVkarisuvavanu:}
\ullekha{parxsAdaliMgatirxvidha - ivu AdiparxsAdi, aMtayxparxsAdi, seVvayx\-parxsAdi eMdu ive ...jaMgamamuKadiMda taqpitxyanunx \hbox{anuBavisidalilx} seVvayxparxsAdiyu, ivanu mAyA\-parxpaMcavanunx aLidavanu (\hbox{shivAkoV.} 90-106).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{seVvayxparxsAdaH asimxnf asitx iti - seVvayxparxsAdavAnf, athavA seVvayxparxsAdiV}}
\end{entry}

\begin{shl}

seVvayxparxsAdakaM cAtha shaqNu teVSAM ca lakaSxNamf ||\\[2pt]
seVvoyxV guruH samasAtxnAM shiva Eva na saMshayaH |\\[2pt]

\begin{entry}
\word{seVvayxsathxla}\label{seVvayxsathxla}
\meaning{\artha{liMgaSaTAkxMtagaRta parxsAdisathxlada oMdu avAMtarasathxla. guruvAkAyxmaqtada AsAvxdaneyiMda AtamxjAcnxna\-vanunx paDeda shiSayxnu guruvaMteyeV pUjayxnAguvudariMda seVvayx eMdenisutAtxne. aMtaha seVvayxnige saMbaMdhisida sathxla:}}
